KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hasar-Sual, Bɛrseba in Biziotia,
Kapsiki_DC: Hasar-Shəwal, Bɛrshɛba ba'a kweci meleme nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Hatsar-Suwal, Beer-Seba wo de Bisyotiya,

Francais: Baala, Jim, Esem,
Anglais: Baalah, and Iim, and Ezem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Baala; Iyim, Atsem;
Bulu: Bala, Iyim, Atsém;
Guiziga: Baˀala, Iyim,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ba'ala e Iyyim e Ecem
Fulfulde_DC: e Ba'ala e Iyyim e Ecem
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bala, Iyim in Esɛm;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bala, Iyim in Esɛm;
Kapsiki_DC: Ba'ala, Iyim, Ɛsɛm,
Tupurri: Baala, Iyim wo de Atsem,

Francais: Eltholad, Césil, Harma,
Anglais: And Eltolad, and Chesil, and Hormah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eltolad, Kesil, Horma;
Bulu: Eltôlad, Késil, Orma;
Guiziga: Eltolat, Kesil, Horma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eltolat e Kesil e Horma
Fulfulde_DC: e Eltolat e Kesil e Horma
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛltolad, Kezil in Ɔrma;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛltolad, Kezil in Ɔrma;
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛltolad, Kɛsil, Horma,
Tupurri: Eltolad, Kesil wo de Horma,

Francais: Siceleg, Médémena, Sensenna,
Anglais: And Ziklag, and Madmannah, and Sansannah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Siklag, Madmanna, Sansana;
Bulu: Tiglag, Madmanna, Sansanna;
Guiziga: Siklak, Matmana, Sanesana,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Cikilak e Madamanna e Sansanna
Fulfulde_DC: e Cikilak e Madamanna e Sansanna
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Siklag, Madmana in Sansana;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Siklag, Madmana in Sansana;
Kapsiki_DC: Siklag, Madmana, Sanesana,
Tupurri: Siglag, Madmana wo de Sansana,

Francais: Lebaoth, Sélim, Aen et Rémon: en tout vingt neuf villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Lebaoth, and Shilhim, and Ain, and Rimmon: all the cities are twenty and nine, with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lebawot, Silhim, Ayin hiɗi Rimmon. Hoyok-ziy ŋulon kaf dok-ma' yam zleeŋe, hiɗi hoyok-ziy guray ma kuɗumna.
Bulu: Lebaôt, Silyim, Ayin a Rimôn, bise bi mbe bitison mewôm mebaé a ébu ô laté a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Lebaˀot, Silim ati En-Rimoŋ, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kukur cuw nga ngoltir waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Lebayot e Silhim e En-Rimmon, ɗum berniiji noogas e joweenayi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Lebayot e Silhim e En-Rimmon, ɗum berniiji noogas e joweenayi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Lebaot, Silɛhim, Ain in Rimɔŋ; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Lebaot, Silɛhim, Ain in Rimɔŋ; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Lebawot, Shilim ba'a Ɛn-Rimon. Ma pɛtɛa melemea shɛhɛ ne, bakemsə meslighəmbe le meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Lebaod, Sihim, Ayin wo de Rimon. Tay äuy äi leege do äog ti kaawa' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Dans la Séphéla: Estaol, Saréa,
Anglais: And in the valley, Eshtaol, and Zorah, and Ashnah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay fulda: Estahol, Soreya, Asna;
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya njeʼese: Estaol, Tôréa, Asna;
Guiziga: Walahay ngir zugudumo: i Esetaˀol, Sora, Asena,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Berniiji maɓɓe nder lesdi towndiije ngoni: Estawol e Cor'a e Asna
Fulfulde_DC: Berniiji maɓɓe nder lesdi towndiije ngoni: Estawol e Cor'a e Asna
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye mɛ hira-nù, nɛ́ Ɛstaɔl, Sorea in Asna;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye mɛ hira-nù, nɛ́ Ɛstaɔl, Sorea in Asna;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi kwake te ŋwela ne, Ɛshetawol, Sora, Ashena,
Tupurri: Wo äi Sefela mono, äe leege ma sen wo diñ Estawol, Soreya wo de Asna,

Francais: Asena, Zanoé, Aen-Gannim, Taphua,
Anglais: And Zanoah, and En–gannim, Tappuah, and Enam,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zanowa, En-Ganim, Tappuwa, Enam;
Bulu: Zanôa, En-Ganim, Tapua, Enam;
Guiziga: Zanoa, En-Ganim, Tapuwa, Enam,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Zanoyak e En-Gannim e Tappuha e Enam
Fulfulde_DC: e Zanoyak e En-Gannim e Tappuha e Enam
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zanɔa, Ɛn-Ganim, Tapua in Ɛinam;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zanɔa, Ɛn-Ganim, Tapua in Ɛinam;
Kapsiki_DC: Zanowa, Ɛn-Ganim, Tapəwa, Ɛnam,
Tupurri: Sanowa, En-Ganim, Tapuwa wo de Enam,

Francais: Enaïm, Jérimoth, Odollam, Socho, Azéca,
Anglais: Jarmuth, and Adullam, Soco, and Azekah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yarmut, Adullam, Soko, Azeka;
Bulu: Yarmut, Adulam, Sôkô Azéka,
Guiziga: Yarmut, Adulam, Soko, Azeka,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yarmut e Adullam e Soko e Azeka
Fulfulde_DC: e Yarmut e Adullam e Soko e Azeka
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yarmut, Adulam, Soko in Asɛka;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yarmut, Adulam, Soko in Asɛka;
Kapsiki_DC: Yarməwt, Adəwlam, Soko, Azɛka,
Tupurri: Yarmud, Adulam, Soko wo de Aseka,

Francais: Saraïm, Adithaïm, Gédéra et Gédérothaïm: quatorze villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Shaaraim, and Adithaim, and Gederah, and Gederothaim; fourteen cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sarayim, Aditayim, Gedera hiɗi Gederotayim; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam fiɗi hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Sarayim, Aditayim, Gedéra a Gedérôtayim: bitison awôm a binyin a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Saˀarayim, Aditayim, Gedera ati Gederotayim, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ nga mufaɗa waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Saarayim e Aditayim e Gedera e Gederotayim, ɗum berniiji sappo e nayi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Saarayim e Aditayim e Gedera e Gederotayim, ɗum berniiji sappo e nayi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Saraim, Aditaim, Gedera in Gederotayim: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Saraim, Aditaim, Gedera in Gederotayim: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Sha'arayim, Aditayim, Gedɛra ba'a Gedɛrotayim. Meŋe wəfaɗeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Saarayim, Aditayim, Gedera wo de Gederotayim. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti naa de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Sanan, Hadassa, Magdal-Gad,
Anglais: Zenan, and Hadashah, and Migdal–gad,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Senan, Hadasa, Migdal-Gad;
Bulu: Tenañ, Adasa, Migdal-Gad,
Guiziga: Yo walahay mekelemey ada ma, i Senaŋ, Hadasa, Mikdal-Gat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Cenan e Hadasa e Migdal-Gada
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Cenan e Hadasa e Migdal-Gada
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Senaŋ, Hadasa in Migdalgad;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Senaŋ, Hadasa in Migdalgad;
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ deŋwa, Senan, Hadasha, Migdal-Gad,
Tupurri: Ma tigriñ wo ni pa diñ Senan, Hadasa wo de Migdal-Gad.

Francais: Déléan, Masépha, Jecthel,
Anglais: And Dilean, and Mizpeh, and Joktheel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dileyan, Mispe, Yokteel;
Bulu: Dileañ, Mispé, Yôktél,
Guiziga: Dilaŋ, Mispe, Yokteyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Dil'aan e Mispe e Yokteyel
Fulfulde_DC: e Dil'aan e Mispe e Yokteyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dilean, Mispɛ in Yokteɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dilean, Mispɛ in Yokteɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Dilan, Mispɛ, Yoktɛyɛl,
Tupurri: Dileyan, Mispe wo de Yogteel

Francais: Lachis, Bascath, Eglon,
Anglais: Lachish, and Bozkath, and Eglon,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lakis, Boskat, Eglon;
Bulu: Lakis, Bôtkat, Egloñ;
Guiziga: Lakis, Boskat, Egloŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Lakis e Boskat e Egilon
Fulfulde_DC: e Lakis e Boskat e Egilon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Lakis, Boskat in Eglɔŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Lakis, Boskat in Eglɔŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Lakish, Boskat, Ɛglon,
Tupurri: Lakis, Boskad wo de Eglon,

Francais: Chebbon, Léhéman, Cethlis,
Anglais: And Cabbon, and Lahmam, and Kithlish,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kabon, Lamas, Kitlik;
Bulu: Kalôn, Lamas, Kitlis;
Guiziga: Kaboŋ, Lahemas, Kitlis,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Kabbon e Lahmas e Kitilis
Fulfulde_DC: e Kabbon e Lahmas e Kitilis
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kabɔŋ, Lamas, in Kitlis;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kabɔŋ, Lamas, in Kitlis;
Kapsiki_DC: Kabon, Lahɛmas, Kitlish,
Tupurri: Kabon, Lahmas wo de Kitlis

Francais: Gideroth, Beth-Dagon, Naama et Macéda: seize ville et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Gederoth, Beth–dagon, and Naamah, and Makkedah; sixteen cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gederot, Bet-Dagon, Naama hiɗi Makkeda; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam karkiya, hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Gedérôt, Bét-Dagon, Naama a Makéda: bitison awôm a bisaman a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Gederot, Bet-Dagoŋ, Naˀama ati Makeda, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ nga merkeɗ waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Gederot e Bayti-Daagon e Na'ama e Makkeda, ɗum berniiji sappo e joweego bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Gederot e Bayti-Daagon e Na'ama e Makkeda, ɗum berniiji sappo e joweego bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gederot, Bɛt-Dagɔŋ, Nama ká bá nɛ̀ Makeda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gederot, Bɛt-Dagɔŋ, Nama ká bá nɛ̀ Makeda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Gedɛrot, Bɛt-Dagon, Na'ama ba'a Makɛda. Meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Gederod, Bet-Dagon, Naama wo de Makeda. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti hiira' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Labana, Ether, Asan,
Anglais: Libnah, and Ether, and Ashan,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Libna, Eter, Asan;
Bulu: Libna, Eter, Akan;
Guiziga: Mekelemey ada vuna mani, i Lipna, Eter, Asaŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Libna e Eter e Asan
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Libna e Eter e Asan
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma nɛ́ Libna, Etɛr in Asaŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma nɛ́ Libna, Etɛr in Asaŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ ɓiyitsa: Libna, Ɛtɛr, Ashan,
Tupurri: Ni pa mono diñ Libna, Eter wo de Asan

Francais: Jephtha, Esna, Nésib,
Anglais: And Jiphtah, and Ashnah, and Nezib,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yifta, Asna, Netsib;
Bulu: Yifta, Akna, Nésib;
Guiziga: Ifta, Asena, Mesip,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yiftah e Asna e Necib
Fulfulde_DC: e Yiftah e Asna e Necib
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yifta, Asna in Nɛsib;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yifta, Asna in Nɛsib;
Kapsiki_DC: Ifta, Ashena, Nɛsib,
Tupurri: Yifta, Asena wo de Netsib

Francais: Céïla, Achzib et Marésa: neuf villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Keilah, and Achzib, and Mareshah; nine cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Keyla, Akzib hiɗi Maresa; hoyok-ziy ŋulon zleeŋe hiɗi ma kuɗumna.
Bulu: Kéla, Akzib a Marésa: bitison ébu a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Keyla, Aksip ati Maresa, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay ngoltir waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ke'ila e Akizib e Maresa, ɗum berniiji joweenayi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ke'ila e Akizib e Maresa, ɗum berniiji joweenayi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɛila, Akzib in Marɛsa: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɛila, Akzib in Marɛsa: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kɛyila, Akzib ba'a Marɛsha. Nahe hɛ kenza kameleme nyi jama jama mesli ba'a meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Keyla, Aksib wo de Maresa. Tay äuy äi leege kaawa' de progre äaara wo,

Francais: Accaron, avec les villes de sa dépendance et ses villages.
Anglais: Ekron, with her towns and her villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ekron, hoyok-ziy ma kuɗa'na;
Bulu: Ekroñ, bitison bi tii a nye a minlame miap;
Guiziga: Mekelemey ma na, i walahay Ekroŋ ati lihey naŋ miwa taŋ waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Ekuruun bee gure maagol e kawyeeji maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Ekuruun bee gure maagol e kawyeeji maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ekrɔŋ in o be ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ekrɔŋ in o be ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ ɓiyitsa, yɛ Ɛkron le meleme ba'a ghedəkwə nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Ekroñ de progre äen wo de sir ma ti äen wo.

Francais: A partir d'Accaron, du côté de l'occident, toutes les villes près d'Azoth et leurs villages;
Anglais: From Ekron even unto the sea, all that lay near Ashdod, with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: fokay hay Ekron pa hiɗi gal ma vulatina, hoyok-ziy ma goboy hiɗi Asdod, hiɗi hoyok-ziy guray ma kuɗa'na;
Bulu: ataté Ekroñ mfaʼa jôp da dim, bitison bise bi ne bebé a Asdôd a minlame miap,
Guiziga: zle a Ekroŋ waɗ kini tisi pas ngi pastaˀ naŋ, waɗ hirwuy migweˀgweˀ avu Asdot jom ti prok taŋahaya wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gal hiirnaaŋge Ekuruun boo berniiji haa wakeere Asdod fuu bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Gal hiirnaaŋge Ekuruun boo berniiji haa wakeere Asdod fuu bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in o ye lɛŋ nɛ duk ká̧ Asdod gu nɛ o geɗek-a mbɛt, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Ekrɔŋ hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Gba-tɔp nɛ war yee-wese;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in o ye lɛŋ nɛ duk ká̧ Asdod gu nɛ o geɗek-a mbɛt, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Ekrɔŋ hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Gba-tɔp nɛ war yee-wese;
Kapsiki_DC: pɛtɛa meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea Asdod, kwelɛ yɛ Ɛkron le ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ.
Tupurri: Sir maga mañ le Ekroñ ka' kal de äi leege ma nen wur bo law ma ti jeñ Asdodn wo äuy de progre äaaran wo,

Francais: Azoth, les villes de sa dépendance et ses villages; Gaza, les villes de sa dépendance et ses villages, jusqu'au torrent d'Egypte et à la Grande mer, qui est la limite.
Anglais: Ashdod with her towns and her villages, Gaza with her towns and her villages, unto the river of Egypt, and the great sea, and the border thereof:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Asdod hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma juni kuɗumna; Gaza hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma juni kuɗa'na, ta-ta tam niy-ma-riŋŋa vi Egipte, tam niy-lum ma ŋolla hiɗi deŋella valamu.
Bulu: Asdôd, bitison bi tii a nye a minlame mié; Gaza, bitison bi tii a nye a minlame mié, akekui, ôtôñe yʼEjipte, e mañ me ne anen a kindiʼi jé.
Guiziga: Asdot ati Gaza waɗ lihey ati prok ngi ciki taŋhaya, hã sesẽŋ a mizaw Ezipte, ciki mubuliy Mediterane, jom ti prok taŋhaya wã ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi Asdod e Gaaza bee gure maaji e kawyeeji maaji, haa yotti maayel Misra e Mbeela bee lesdi haa fomoonde maago.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi Asdod e Gaaza bee gure maaji e kawyeeji maaji, haa yotti maayel Misra e Mbeela bee lesdi haa fomoonde maago.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ Asdod in Gaza in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa zir nɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Gba-tɔp hɔ nɛnɛ be-zer Egiptɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ Asdod in Gaza in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa zir nɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Gba-tɔp hɔ nɛnɛ be-zer Egiptɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Asdod ba'a Gaza le meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ, tsagha meleme nyi dzeyi mɛa hələa ka Ɛzhipte pa kwa ndərə Mɛditɛranɛ.
Tupurri: Asdod de progre äen wo de sir ma ti äen wo, Gasa de progre äen wo de sir ma ti äen wo, haçaç wo go jag pyew ma Ejipte no, le' wo go jag maarog ma kluu no.

Francais: Dans la montagne: Samir, Jéther, Socoth,
Anglais: And in the mountains, Shamir, and Jattir, and Socoh,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kulo kay hiɗiyna: Samir, Yattir, Soko;
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya nkô: Kamir, Yatié, Sôkô,
Guiziga: Walahay vay muwãhaya i: Samir, Yatir, Soko.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lesdi kooseeje woodi Samir e Yattir e Soko
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lesdi kooseeje woodi Samir e Yattir e Soko
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn mgbara kaya, mɛ̀ nɛ́ Samir, Yatir in Soko;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn mgbara kaya, mɛ̀ nɛ́ Samir, Yatir in Soko;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi pelɛ hwa ghweme ne, Shamir, Yatir, Soko,
Tupurri: Äi leege ma ti huulin wo diñ Samir, Yatir wo de Soko,

Francais: Danna, Cariath-Senna, qui est Dabir,
Anglais: And Dannah, and Kirjath–sannah, which is Debir,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Danna, Kiryat-Sanna, ta ya' Debir.
Bulu: Dana, Kiryat-Sana, nye a ne Debir,
Guiziga: Dana, Kiriyat-Sana, a zilaka Debir ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Danna e Kiriyat-Sanna–kanjum woni Debir–
Fulfulde_DC: e Danna e Kiriyat-Sanna–kanjum woni Debir–
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dana in Kiriat-Sana nɛ‘i sa'e Debir;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dana in Kiriat-Sana nɛ‘i sa'e Debir;
Kapsiki_DC: Dana, Kiriyat-Sana nya heka mbeli kaDebir,
Tupurri: Dana, Kiryat-Sana maga diñ Debir mono,

Francais: Anab, Istémo, Anim,
Anglais: And Anab, and Eshtemoh, and Anim,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Anab, Estemu, Anim;
Bulu: Anab Ektemô, Anim;
Guiziga: Anap, Estemoa, Anim,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Anaba e Estemo e Anim
Fulfulde_DC: e Anaba e Estemo e Anim
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Anab, Ɛstɛmɔ in Anim;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Anab, Ɛstɛmɔ in Anim;
Kapsiki_DC: Anab, Ɛshtemowa, Anim,
Tupurri: Anab, Estemo wo de Anim,

Francais: Gosen, Olon et Gilo: onze villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Goshen, and Holon, and Giloh; eleven cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gosen, Holon hiɗi Gilo, hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam kep, hiɗi hoyok-ziy guray ma kuɗumna;
Bulu: Gôzen, Ôloñ a Gilô: bitison awôm a jia a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Goseŋ, Holoŋ ati Gilo, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀa, jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Goosan e Holon e Gilo, ɗum berniiji sappo e go'o bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Goosan e Holon e Gilo, ɗum berniiji sappo e go'o bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɔsɛn, Hɔlɔŋ in Gilo; o gasa ye ɓu-zua-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɔsɛn, Hɔlɔŋ in Gilo; o gasa ye ɓu-zua-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Goshɛn, Holon ba'a Gilo, meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Gosen, Holon wo de Gilo. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti boñ de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Arab, Duma, Esaan,
Anglais: Arab, and Dumah, and Eshean,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Arab, Duma, Ekeyan;
Bulu: Arab, Duma, Ekeañ;
Guiziga: Yo numuŋhoy ada ma, i: Arap, Ruma, Esaŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Araba e Ruma e Esiyan
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Araba e Ruma e Esiyan
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ara, Duma, in Eseaŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ara, Duma, in Eseaŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ perə: Arab, Rəwma, Ɛshan.
Tupurri: Arab, Duma wo de Eseyan

Francais: Janum, Beth-Thaphua, Aphéca,
Anglais: And Janum, and Beth–tappuah, and Aphekah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yanum, Bet-Tappuwa, Afeka;
Bulu: Yanum, Bét-Tapua, Aféka
Guiziga: Yanum, Bet-Tapuwa, Afeka,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yanum e Bayti-Tappuha e Afeka
Fulfulde_DC: e Yanum e Bayti-Tappuha e Afeka
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yanum, Bɛt-Tapua in Afɛka;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yanum, Bɛt-Tapua in Afɛka;
Kapsiki_DC: Yanəwm Bɛt-Tapəwa, Afɛka,
Tupurri: Yanum, Bet-Tapuwa wo de Afeka,

Francais: Athmatha, Cariath-Arbé, qui est Hébron, et Sior: neuf villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Humtah, and Kirjath–arba, which is Hebron, and Zior; nine cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humeta, Kiryat-Arba, ta ya' Hebron hiɗi Sihor; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon zleeŋe hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Uméta Kiryat-Arba, nye a ne Ebroñ a Tior: bitison ébu a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Humeta, Kiriyat-Arba, a zilaka Hebroŋ ma, waɗ Siyor, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay ngoltir jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Humta e Kiriyat-Arba– kanjum woni Heburuun–e Ci'or, ɗum berniiji joweenayi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Humta e Kiriyat-Arba– kanjum woni Heburuun–e Ci'or, ɗum berniiji joweenayi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Humɛta, Kiriat-Arba, wen nɛ tɔ̧ Hebrɔŋ in Siɔr: gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Humɛta, Kiriat-Arba, wen nɛ tɔ̧ Hebrɔŋ in Siɔr: gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Həwmeta, Kiriyat-Arba, nya heka mbeli kaHɛbron ba'a Siyor, meleme mesli nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Humeta, Kiryat-Arba maga diñ Hebroñ mono wo de Siyor. Tay äuy äi leege kaawa' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Maon, Carmel, Ziph, Jota,
Anglais: Maon, Carmel, and Ziph, and Juttah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mawon, Karmel, Zif, Yutta;
Bulu: Maôn Karmél, Zif, Yuta.
Guiziga: Mekelemey ada vuna mani, i: Maˀoŋ, Karmel, Zif, Yuta,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Ma'on e Karmel e Zif e Yuta
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Ma'on e Karmel e Zif e Yuta
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma nɛ́ Maɔŋ, Karmɛl, Zif in Yut;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma nɛ́ Maɔŋ, Karmɛl, Zif in Yut;
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ perə: Mawon, Karmɛl, Zif, Yəwta,
Tupurri: Maon, Karmel, Sif wo de Yuta,

Francais: Jezraël, Jucadam, Zanoé, Accaïn, Gabaa,
Anglais: And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yisreel, Yokdeyam, Zanowa,
Bulu: Yizrél, Yokdéam, Zanôa,
Guiziga: Zisreyel, Yokdeˀam, Zanoˀa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yisre'el e Yokde'am e Zanoha
Fulfulde_DC: e Yisre'el e Yokde'am e Zanoha
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yizreɛl, Yokdeam in Zanɔa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yizreɛl, Yokdeam in Zanɔa;
Kapsiki_DC: Zhizrɛyɛl, Yokdɛyam, Zanowa,
Tupurri: Jisreyel, Yokdeyam wo de Sanowa,

Francais: Thamma: dix villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: Cain, Gibeah, and Timnah; ten cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayin, Gibeya hiɗi Timna, hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Kayin, Gibéa a Timna: Bitison awôm a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Kayẽ, Gibeya ati Timna, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀu, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Kayina e Gibiya e Timna, ɗum berniiji sappo bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Kayina e Gibiya e Timna, ɗum berniiji sappo bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kayin, Gibea in Timna: o gasa ye ɓu in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kayin, Gibea in Timna: o gasa ye ɓu in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kayin, Gibɛya ba'a Timna, meŋe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Kayin, Gibeya wo de Timna. Tay äuy äi leege hwal de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Halhul, Bessur, Gédor,
Anglais: Halhul, Beth–zur, and Gedor,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Halhul, Bet-Sur, Gedor;
Bulu: Alul, Bét-Sur, Gedor;
Guiziga: Ngi kiɗa mi taŋ wãˀ na, i walahay Halul, Bet-Sur, Gedor,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Halkul e Bayti-Cura e Gedor
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Halkul e Bayti-Cura e Gedor
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Halul, Bɛt-Sur in Gedɔr;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Halul, Bɛt-Sur in Gedɔr;
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ kwa keɗaŋe: Haləwl, Bɛt-Səwr, Gedor,
Tupurri: Halhul, Bet-Sur wo de Gedor,

Francais: Mareth, Beth-Anoth et Eltécon; six villes, et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Maarath, and Beth–anoth, and Eltekon; six cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Maarat, Bet-Anot hiɗi Eltekon, hoyok-ziy ŋulon karkiya hiɗi ma gurayna.
Bulu: Maarat, Bét-Anôt a Eltekôn: bitison bisaman a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Maharat, Bet-Anot ati Eltekoŋ, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay merkeɗ, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ma'arat e Bayti-Anot e Eltekon, ɗum berniiji joweego bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ma'arat e Bayti-Anot e Eltekon, ɗum berniiji joweego bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Marat, Bɛt-Anɔt in Ɛltekɔŋ: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Marat, Bɛt-Anɔt in Ɛltekɔŋ: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma'arat, Bɛt-Anot ba'a Ɛltekone, meleme ŋkwaŋe nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ,
Tupurri: Maarad, Bet-Anod wo de Eltekon. Tay äuy äi leege hiira' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Cariath-Baal, qui est Cariath-Jéarim, et Arebba: deux villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: Kirjath–baal, which is Kirjath–jearim, and Rabbah; two cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kiryat-Baal ta ya' Kiryat-Yeyarim, hiɗi Rabba, hoyok-ziy ma' hiɗi ma gurayna valamu.
Bulu: Kiryat-Bal, nye a ne Kiryat-Yearim a Raba: bitison bibaé a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Yo Kiriyat-Baˀal, ada zilaka Kiriyat-Yeˀarime ma, waɗ Raba, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay cuw, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Kiriyat-Ba'al– kanjum woni Kiriyat-Ye'arim–e Rabba, ɗum berniiji ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Kiriyat-Ba'al– kanjum woni Kiriyat-Ye'arim–e Rabba, ɗum berniiji ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma nɛ́ Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim, in Raba: gasa ye yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma nɛ́ Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim, in Raba: gasa ye yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha Kiriyat-Ba'al nya kaKiriyat-Yɛarim ba'a Raba. Meleme bake nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Kiryat-Baal maga diñ Kiryat-Yearim mono, wo de Raba. Äi leege se äogn wo de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Dans le désert: Beth-Araba, Meddin, Sachacha,
Anglais: In the wilderness, Beth–arabah, Middin, and Secacah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay fulda: Bet-Araba, Middin, Sekaka;
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya fé: Bet-Araba, Midin, Sekaka;
Guiziga: A wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka, i: Bet-Araba, Midiŋ, Sekaka,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ladde woodi Bayti-Araba e Middin e Sekaka
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ladde woodi Bayti-Araba e Middin e Sekaka
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛ́ Bɛt-Araba, Midin in Sekaka;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛ́ Bɛt-Araba, Midin in Sekaka;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi te ɓerama ne, Bɛt-Araba, Midin, Sekaka,
Tupurri: Äi leege ma äil puulin wo diñ Bet-Araba, Midiñ, Sekaka,

Francais: Nebsan, Ir-Hammélach et En-Gaddi: six villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Nibshan, and the city of Salt, and En–gedi; six cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nibsan hiɗi Ir-Hamela, hiɗi Eyin-Gedi; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon karkiya, hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayn kaw.
Bulu: Nibkan, Ir-Améla a Eyin-Gédi: bitison bisaman a minlame miap;
Guiziga: Nibesaŋ, Ir-Mela, ati En-Gedi, jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay merkeɗe, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Nibsan e Ir-Mela e En-Gedi, ɗum berniiji joweego bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Nibsan e Ir-Mela e En-Gedi, ɗum berniiji joweego bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nibsaŋ, Ye Tɔŋ in Ɛn-Gedi: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nibsaŋ, Ye Tɔŋ in Ɛn-Gedi: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Nibeshan, Ir-Mɛla ba'a Ɛn-Gɛdi, ŋkwaŋe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Nibsan, Ir-Hamela wo de En-Gedi. Tay äuy äi leege hiira' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Les fils de Juda ne purent pas chasser les Jébuséens qui habitent à Jérusalem, et les Jébuséens ont habité à Jérusalem avec les fils de Juda jusqu'à ce jour.
Anglais: As for the Jebusites the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the children of Judah could not drive them out: but the Jebusites dwell with the children of Judah at Jerusalem unto this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yebusiyena sa ka li ziy hay Yerusalemna, gurona vi Yuda may digiɗsi goyɗi, sum sa Yebusiyena ka laki ziy jar gurona vi Yuda hay Yerusalem ta-ta vaydi.
Bulu: bone be Yuda be nga bo teke ngule ya nyoñe si Beyébuzieñ mbe be nga too Yérusalém; Beyébuzieñ bete baa be bone be Yuda be nga tabe Yérusalém azukui môse wu.
Guiziga: Mizli Zebusihey misi a Zeruzalem na, dideˀ ngi Zudahay a ɓulaka taŋ avra gu ta. Vurˀe, hã dana kwana, Zebusiheye t'ada jom ati dideˀ ngi Zudahay ar walahay Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Yebusi'en jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, yimɓe Yahuuda mbaawaay riiwugo ɓe. Ngam maajum Yebusi'en ɗon njooɗodi bee yimɓe Yahuuda haa wargo hannde .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Yebusi'en jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, yimɓe Yahuuda mbaawaay riiwugo ɓe. Ngam maajum Yebusi'en ɗon njooɗodi bee yimɓe Yahuuda haa wargo hannde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ Juda nyɛm so mɛ ndak o be Jebus nɛ ɔ Jerusalɛm na. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be Jebus ɔ nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm mgbara o bezaŋ Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ Juda nyɛm so mɛ ndak o be Jebus nɛ ɔ Jerusalɛm na. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be Jebus ɔ nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm mgbara o bezaŋ Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Shaŋe hwelefefia Zhəwda kaŋka ka Zhɛbəs nyi mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, mba ka Zhɛbəs hwa mbelia Zhəwda le nza ta nci mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm pa ɓeshi.
Tupurri: Jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan joñ wo de eegre ma nii jar Yebus maga hay wo de tiñ Jerusalem go gaè. Jar Yebus joñ wo de tiñ yoo jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan wo haçaç wara.

Francais: La part échue par le sort aux fils de Joseph commençait, du côté de l'orient, depuis le Jourdain de Jéricho, jusqu'aux eaux de Jéricho; c'était ensuite le désert qui monte de Jéricho à Béthel par la montagne.
Anglais: And the lot of the children of Joseph fell from Jordan by Jericho, unto the water of Jericho on the east, to the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho throughout mount Beth–el,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata ta nisi vula' mi gurona vi Yosefta, vuna' fokis hay Yordan pa, goboy hiɗi Yeriko, hay galla vi niyna Yeriko, gal kuɗuwu, hay fulda ta fokis hay Yeriko pa, hay hiɗiyta vi Betel.
Bulu: Akap e nga veban be bone be Yôsep e nga taté Yurdéñ, bebé Yérikô, e jôp da tôô, e lôte nkôte si wo yené, ataté e Yérikô nkôle Bétél.
Guiziga: Hirwuy ngi dideˀ ngi Zozefeye, a zlo zle a mizaw Zurdeŋ migweˀ a ciki Zeriko, tisi pas ngi miprik ngi miyam Zeriko, i wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗak majiɗ zle a Zeriko ngir ti muwã Betel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Geɗal lesdi ngal laatani danygol Yusufu fuɗɗi haa maayo Urdun baŋnge Yeriko, haa fuunaaŋge ceeɓooje Yeriko. Nden keerol maɓɓe nasti nder ladde, diga Yeriko haa kooseeje Baytila.
Fulfulde_DC: Geɗal lesdi ngal laatani danygol Yusufu fuɗɗi haa maayo Urdun baŋnge Yeriko, haa fuunaaŋge ceeɓooje Yeriko. Nden keerol maɓɓe nasti nder ladde, diga Yeriko haa kooseeje Baytila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa ku̧u̧ naŋ ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn mgbák ká̧ Jeriko, e be-zer Jeriko nɛ war yee-wese. Fara'i duka nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ daŋ nɛ Jeriko si zu kaya Bɛtɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa ku̧u̧ naŋ ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn mgbák ká̧ Jeriko, e be-zer Jeriko nɛ war yee-wese. Fara'i duka nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ daŋ nɛ Jeriko si zu kaya Bɛtɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hɛɗi nya kaŋa ŋwalea Zhozɛf nya kemave hɛ laka sla kwasheghediɗi ne, se kwa Zhəwrdɛŋe, laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea hələa Zhɛriko, kajive laka ɓerama nya keslə mbe Zhɛriko kadzeme ghweme ta Bɛtɛl.
Tupurri: Jag tway maga aè caa ne jar ni Josef wo mañ le de Jurdeçeç ma äiñ Jeriko no, le' go ti bii ma Jeriko ma nen wur bo toñ no kay no. Se hee ti puuli ma Jeriko no le' go de huuli ma Betel no.

Francais: La frontière aboutissait de Béthel à Luz, et passait vers la frontière des Archéens à Ataroth.
Anglais: And goeth out from Beth–el to Luz, and passeth along unto the borders of Archi to Ataroth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kalis hay Betel hay Luz, cap hay jaara vi sa Arkiyena hay Atarot.
Bulu: Beta nkôle a kui Luz, a lôt a ke nné Bearkieñ Atarôt.
Guiziga: Jek naŋ, zle a Betele kini nga Luz. A ra bi ar maakway ngi Atarot, walahay ngi mizli Arkihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngol ummi Baytila, yehi haa Luus, ngol tokki gal lesdi Arki'en haa Atarot.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngol ummi Baytila, yehi haa Luus, ngol tokki gal lesdi Arki'en haa Atarot.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ́ Bɛtɛl hɔ Luz ɓir si war  gbìsí  ko o be Ark sɛn Atarot,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ́ Bɛtɛl hɔ Luz ɓir si war  gbìsí  ko o be Ark sɛn Atarot,
Kapsiki_DC: Se tagha ne, kadzawa nde laka Ləwz, kadzeyi laka ghala ta ka Ark nyi mbe Atarot,
Tupurri: Se ur le Betel ni ka' le' go Lus, mañ go ti hagu de jar Arkiyeçeç maga wo äi leege Atarod mono.

Francais: De là, elle descendait à l'occident, vers la frontière des Jephlétiens jusqu'à la frontière de Béthoron le Bas et jusqu'à Gazer, et elle aboutissait à la mer.
Anglais: And goeth down westward to the coast of Japhleti, unto the coast of Beth–horon the nether, and to Gezer: and the goings out thereof are at the sea.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni nam kal hay gal vulatiya, hay jaara vi sa Yafeletna, ta-ta hay nagata vi Bet-Horon ta gaata, ta-ta hay Gezer kay co goy kat niy-lum ma ŋolla.
Bulu: A siliki e jôp da dim, nné Beyafeletieñ, a kui éfuse si ya Bétôroñ nké, a ke fe kui Gézér na e vam e mañ.
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, maakway a jik jik kini ng'ar maakway ngi mizli Yaflehey, hã sesẽŋ a Bet-Horoŋ-muzugudum, yo sesẽŋ a Gezer, waɗ ara kiɗ mi a mi mubuliy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol diirti gal hiirnaaŋge haa lesdi Yafleti'en, haa yotti lesdi Baytihurun-les e Gezer, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol diirti gal hiirnaaŋge haa lesdi Yafleti'en, haa yotti lesdi Baytihurun-les e Gezer, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ zum si war yee-wese sitɛ  gbìsì  ko o be Yaflɛt hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ zika-nù Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ, gɔm nɛ Gezɛr si kpa nɛ Gba-tɔp.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ zum si war yee-wese sitɛ  gbìsì  ko o be Yaflɛt hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ zika-nù Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ, gɔm nɛ Gezɛr si kpa nɛ Gba-tɔp.
Kapsiki_DC: kadzawa laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci te hɛɗia ka Yaflɛt, kajive mbe hɛɗia Bɛt-Horon nya kwake kwake ba'a Gɛzɛr, kazhigə kwa ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ.
Tupurri: Se mañ go nen wur bo law go ti hagu de jar Yafeletiyeçeç wo haçaç wo go äil sir Bet-Horon ma de hamge gesiñ no, le' go Geser haçaç wo go jag maarog no.

Francais: Tel est l'héritage que reçurent les fils de Joseph, Manassé et Ephraïm.
Anglais: So the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti vocota vi gurona vi Yosef, Manase hiɗi Efrayim.
Bulu: Ngabe bon be Yôsep nje le: Manasé baa Efrayim.
Guiziga: Manase ati Efrayime, i ziri ngi Zozefey. Hirwuy muvulaka taŋ mi nga taŋ, naŋ kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii le'i Manassa e Efrayim, ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ndoniri geɗe maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii le'i Manassa e Efrayim, ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ndoniri geɗe maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf: Manase in Efraim, duka hee mɔ‘i ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf: Manase in Efraim, duka hee mɔ‘i ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse hɛɗia hwelefe ta Zhozɛf, geze ta ŋkɛ yɛ Manasɛ le Ɛfrayim.
Tupurri: Sen mo na diñ tway maga aè caa ne Manase wo de Efrayim jar ni Josefn wo mono.

Francais: Voici la frontière des fils d'Ephraïm, selon leurs familles. La limite de leur héritage était, à l'orient, Ataroth-Addar jusqu'à Béthoron le Haut.
Anglais: And the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families was thus: even the border of their inheritance on the east side was Ataroth–addar, unto Beth–horon the upper;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi jaara vi gurona vi Efrayim, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya. Jar nagata ta vocota visi kayni, hay gal ma kuɗuwna: Atarot-Addar, ta-ta Bet-Horon ta kulota.
Bulu: Nné bon bʼEfrayim nye nyô, avalʼane mebume map me né: nné ya ngabe jap a mbe mfaʼa jôp da tôô: Atarôt-Adar, a kui Bétôroñ akôé.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Efrayimeye, hirwuy mislaka taŋ di vur muyo vur muyo anihĩ: Tisi pas ngi miprike, maakway taŋ a zli zle avu walahay Atrot-Adar, hã sesẽŋ a Bet-Horoŋ vay Muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko laati geɗal lenyol Efrayim bee geɓe maagol: Keerol maɓɓe fuunaaŋgewol fuɗɗi haa Aterot-Addar, yehi Baytihurun-dow.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko laati geɗal lenyol Efrayim bee geɓe maagol: Keerol maɓɓe fuunaaŋgewol fuɗɗi haa Aterot-Addar, yehi Baytihurun-dow.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsí-nù  ko zuduk ko Efraim nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ́ Atrɔt-Adar hɔ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsí-nù  ko zuduk ko Efraim nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ́ Atrɔt-Adar hɔ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ghala ta ŋkwa hwelefe ta Ɛfrayim kepelə kepelə nya: ma ghala ta ŋa nci ŋkwa ne, se mbe Atarot-Adar nya laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci hwa'a mbe Bɛt-Horon nya biya,
Tupurri: Tway maga aè caa ne jar ma ti wer mani Efrayim wo go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a. Hagu äaara ma nen wur bo toñn ur le Atarot-Adar haçaç le' wo go Bet-Horon ma de mañge ciñ no.

Francais: La frontière aboutissait, du côté de l'occident, vers Machméthath, au nord; et la frontière tournait à l'orient, vers Thanath-Sélo et passait devant elle, vers l'orient de Janoé.
Anglais: And the border went out toward the sea to Michmethah on the north side; and the border went about eastward unto Taanath–shiloh, and passed by it on the east to Janohah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara visi co hay gal ma vulatina hay gal Mikmeta gal gaa'a, hay gal ma kuɗuwna, gal Tanat-Silo, nam jik kalam gal kuɗuwu, hay gal Yanowa.
Bulu: Nné a nga kui mfaʼa jôp da dim, étune ya Mikmétat akôé, a beta kôñelan mfaʼa jôp da tôô, étune ya Taanat-Silô a tyiʼilan e jôp da tôô, mfaʼa ya Yanôa.
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, jek ngi maakwaya, naŋ kini nga Mikmeta, tir vay muŋ. Yo a guno gunno ng'asi pas ngi miprike nga Taˀanat-Silo, a tuwuɗ tisi pas ngi miprike nga Yanoˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge, ngol tokki gal woyla haa Mikmetat. Ngol wayliti gal fuunaaŋge yahugo Ta'anat-Silo, ngol saali gaɗa berniwol man haa fuunaaŋge Yanoha.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge, ngol tokki gal woyla haa Mikmetat. Ngol wayliti gal fuunaaŋge yahugo Ta'anat-Silo, ngol saali gaɗa berniwol man haa fuunaaŋge Yanoha.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ war yee-wese,  gbìsì  ɓir nɛ Mikmɛtat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zika si Tanat-Silo nɛ war daŋa-wese ɓir hi̧i̧ tik Yanɔa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ war yee-wese,  gbìsì  ɓir nɛ Mikmɛtat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zika si Tanat-Silo nɛ war daŋa-wese ɓir hi̧i̧ tik Yanɔa,
Kapsiki_DC: se tagha ne, hwa'a mɛa ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ. Laka bela kwa gwela ne, kadzeyi nde takwa yitea Mikmɛtat. Laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea Mikmɛtat ne, kadzeyi nde laka Ta'anat-Silo nya jive nde, kajive hwa'a mbe Yanowa.
Tupurri: Hagu ma nen wur bo lawn le' wo go nen Mikmetad nen äañ gloñhwede äe no kay no. Se äas le ne Taanat-Silo ti, raw see äe wo go nen Yanowa nen wur bo toñ no kay no.

Francais: De Janoé, elle descendait à Ataroth et à Naaratha, touchait à Jéricho et aboutissait au Jourdain.
Anglais: And it went down from Janohah to Ataroth, and to Naarath, and came to Jericho, and went out at Jordan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Yanowa pa, nam jik hay Atarot hiɗi Narata, jik kat Yeriko, ta-ta co kel Yordan.
Bulu: Akôlô ya Yanôa, nné a siliki mfaʼa ya Atarôt a Naarata, a nnambe Yérikô, a ke vame Yordan.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, a pi sar ti Yanoˀa nga Atarot ati Naˀara, a ndil a Zeriko, waɗ ara kiɗo mi a mizaw Zurdeŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa Yanoha ngol diirti gal Atarot e Na'arat, ngol meemi Yeriko, ngol haaɗi haa maayo Urdun.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa Yanoha ngol diirti gal Atarot e Na'arat, ngol meemi Yeriko, ngol haaɗi haa maayo Urdun.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: gɔm nɛ Yanɔa si Atarot in Narata hɔ sɛn Jeriko si kpa nɛ Jurdɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: gɔm nɛ Yanɔa si Atarot in Narata hɔ sɛn Jeriko si kpa nɛ Jurdɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Se mbe Yanowa ne, kadzawa nde laka yɛ Atarot le Na'ara, laka Zhɛriko ba'a kazhigə kwa Zhəwrdɛŋe.
Tupurri: Se ur le Yanowa ni ka' wo go Atarod wo de Naarata, hee wo Jeriko day ndu wo go jag Jurdeçeç.

Francais: De Taphuah, elle allait, du côté de l'occident, au torrent de Cana, pour aboutir à la mer. Tel fut l'héritage des fils d'Ephraïm selon leurs familles.
Anglais: The border went out from Tappuah westward unto the river Kanah; and the goings out thereof were at the sea. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Ephraim by their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Tappuwa pa, nam kal gal vulatiya hay niy-ma-riŋŋa vi Kana, kay co goy kel niy-lum ma ŋolla. Kayni ti vocota vi gurona vi Efrayim kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya,
Bulu: Akôlô a kôlô Tapua, a lumbu mfaʼa jôp da dim, ôtôñe Kana, a ke vame mañ. Ngabe si bon bʼEfrayim, avalʼane mebume map me né, nje le.
Guiziga: Maakway a bi baɗ ti Tapuwa kini nga mizaw Kana tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, waɗ ara kiɗ mi a mi mubuliy Meditarane. Hirwuy muvulaka da dideˀ ngi Efrayimey vur muyo vur muyo naŋ kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Keerol maɓɓe saali haa hiirnaaŋge Tappuha yahugo maayel Kana, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Efrayim bee geɓe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Keerol maɓɓe saali haa hiirnaaŋge Tappuha yahugo maayel Kana, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Efrayim bee geɓe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war Tapua,  gbisi  ɓira si war yee-wese sitɛ foka-yì Kana, kaɗi nɛnɛ nu Gba-tɔp. Mɔɔ-oi ko zuduk ko Efraim nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war Tapua,  gbisi  ɓira si war yee-wese sitɛ foka-yì Kana, kaɗi nɛnɛ nu Gba-tɔp. Mɔɔ-oi ko zuduk ko Efraim nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci yitea Mikmɛtat ne, se mbe Tapəwa nde hwa'a kwa hələa Kana, kazhigə kwa ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ. Tsetse ŋa hwelefe ta ŋwalea Ɛfrayim kala nza ta yɛ peləa nci.
Tupurri: Hagun ur Tapuwa ka' fer go nen wur bo law no kay, le' wo go ti pyew ma Kana no, kal wo go jag maarog ma kluu no. Mo so no diñ tway maga aè caa ne jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Efrayim wo mono, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta'ta'a.

Francais: Les fils d'Ephraïm eurent aussi des villes séparées au milieu de l'héritage des fils de Manassé, toutes avec leurs villages.
Anglais: And the separate cities for the children of Ephraim were among the inheritance of the children of Manasseh, all the cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi hoyok-ziyna ma vuli mi gurona vi Efrayim, jar naga ma vuli mi gurona vi Manase, hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna kuɗum kafe.
Bulu: Nalé fe bitison bi nga veban asu bon bʼEfrayim ézezañ ya ngabe bone be Manasé, bise a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Mbak walahayay mihĩˀĩ ngi dideˀ ngi Efrayimey, misi a wuzla hirwuy ngi dideˀ ngi Manasehey na le na, walahay tayna jom ti prok taŋhaya, i muvula taŋ di le ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum hawti bee berniiji goɗɗi e gure maaji nder keeri lenyol Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum hawti bee berniiji goɗɗi e gure maaji nder keeri lenyol Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi tɔr o ye nɛ wa ee ha̧ zuduk ko Efraim sɛn mgbara mɔɔ-oi ko Manase na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o gasa ye in o ye nɛ zik wa lɛŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi tɔr o ye nɛ wa ee ha̧ zuduk ko Efraim sɛn mgbara mɔɔ-oi ko Manase na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o gasa ye in o ye nɛ zik wa lɛŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli mbakete nda kweci meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ te hɛɗia hwelefe ta Manasɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege jar ni Efrayim wo de sir ma ti äaara wo hay yañ wo go ti tway mani jar ni Manasen wo pa.

Francais: Ils ne chassèrent pas les Chananéens qui habitaient à Gazer, et les Chananéens ont habité jusqu'à ce jour au milieu d'Ephraïm, mais assujettis à la corvée.
Anglais: And they drave not out the Canaanites that dwelt in Gezer: but the Canaanites dwell among the Ephraimites unto this day, and serve under tribute.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kanaaniyana sa ka li ziy hay Gezer, nisi may digiɗsi goyɗi, sum sa Kanaaniyana ka li ziy jar jafna vi Efrayim ta-ta vaydi. May nisi tunsi lop ma nekŋa kisiya.
Bulu: Ve be nga bo te wôlé Bekananééñ be nga too Gézér si jap. Bekananééñ bete be nga tabe ézezañe jap a kui môse wu. Ve be too alo ya bo be bisaé.
Guiziga: Amma Kanaˀanay misi a Gezer na, mizli ngi Efrayimey a ɓulaka taŋ ta. Vurˀe, Kanaˀanaya t'ada a wuzla dideˀ ngi Efrayimeye hã dana aruŋ. Amma so na, dideˀ ngi Efrayimeye, a vulaka taŋ slra ngi gi sey mitakˀay le ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓe ndiiwaay Kanaani'en jooɗiiɓe haa Gezer. Ngam maajum Kanaani'en ɗon njooɗi caka yimɓe Efrayim haa wargo hannde. Ɓe laati maccuɓe maɓɓe ɓe ɗon kuuwana ɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓe ndiiwaay Kanaani'en jooɗiiɓe haa Gezer. Ngam maajum Kanaani'en ɗon njooɗi caka yimɓe Efrayim haa wargo hannde. Ɓe laati maccuɓe maɓɓe ɓe ɗon kuuwana ɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn Gezɛr na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ nɛ o be Kanaŋ ɔ nɛnɛ mgbara o be Efraim hɔ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ ŋga tom-bara.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn Gezɛr na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ nɛ o be Kanaŋ ɔ nɛnɛ mgbara o be Efraim hɔ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ ŋga tom-bara.
Kapsiki_DC: Keŋkamte ka Kanan nyi hwa hɛ le nza hɛ mbe Gɛzɛr ka Ɛfrayim we. Mba hɛ hwa hɛ le nza hwa'a va ɓeshi. Ama nahe hɛ kenza kaka mavashia nci.
Tupurri: Ane jar ni Efrayim nii wo jar Kanaan maga hay wo Geser go gaè. Jar Kanaan sen joñ wo de tiñ yoo äaara haçaç wara, ane jar ni Efrayim kañ wo joñre ma de poçoçre wo ne hara ti.

Francais: Il y eut encore une part échue par le sort pour la tribu de Manassé, car il était le premier-né de Joseph. Machir, premier-né de Manassé et père de Galaad, avait reçu Galaad et Basan, car il était homme de guerre.
Anglais: There was also a lot for the tribe of Manasseh; for he was the firstborn of Joseph; to wit, for Machir the firstborn of Manasseh, the father of Gilead: because he was a man of war, therefore he had Gilead and Bashan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manase goor ma ŋolla vi Yosef kaw nisi vulum ir galla valamu. Makir, goor ma ŋolla vi Manase bum Galaad, nisi vulum Galaad hay Basan, kay namu mi sana vi duura.
Bulu: Ayoñe Manasé, ntôle mone Yôsep, e nga nyoñe fe ngap. Makir, ntôle mone Manasé, a too fe ésaa Galad, a nga nyoñe Galad a Basañ, amu a mbe môta mewosan.
Guiziga: Manase i modogom ngi Zozef, Makire kwana, i modogom ngi Manase ya, i cine ngi Galaˀat, muwuɗkaka hirwuy na, a lumam mi nga taŋ i vay Galaˀat ati Basaŋ. Asi mike na, Makire, i mbur ngi vurum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Manassa, afo Yusufu boo heɓi geɗal lesdi maagol. Makir, afo Manassa, baaba Gile'at, heɓi lesdi Gile'at e Baasan ngam o goɗɗo kaɓoowo.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Manassa, afo Yusufu boo heɓi geɗal lesdi maagol. Makir, afo Manassa, baaba Gile'at, heɓi lesdi Gile'at e Baasan ngam o goɗɗo kaɓoowo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nù nɛ tani baa ha̧ zuduk ko Manase nɛ duka nɛ kaya-bem ko Jozɛf nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Makir duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Manase, a̧ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Galad mbɛt, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ nú Galad ha̧ a̧, wen a̧ duka so nɛ ŋgaŋa wi-biro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nù nɛ tani baa ha̧ zuduk ko Manase nɛ duka nɛ kaya-bem ko Jozɛf nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Makir duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Manase, a̧ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Galad mbɛt, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ nú Galad ha̧ a̧, wen a̧ duka so nɛ ŋgaŋa wi-biro.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ŋa hwelefefia Manasɛ nya bela, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe ŋkɛ kenza katezhɛa wəzege ta Zhozɛf. Makir ya katezhɛa Manasɛ, yitenyɛa Gala'ad nde kemave hɛɗia Gala'ad ba'a Bashan, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe ŋkɛ kenza kawəndə kempa laka same ta veci yitea Zhəwrdɛŋe.
Tupurri: AÈ haç tway ne jar ni Manase jag weel Josefn lay. Jar ni Makir jag weel mani Manasen ga diñ Galaad hay da' wo sir ma äaaran wo le go äil sir Galaad wo de Basañ werga Makir hay diñ jobo ma de ko durgi.

Francais: Un lot fut aussi assigné aux autres fils de Manassé, selon leurs familles, aux fils d'Abiézer, aux fils de Hélec, aux fils d'Esriel, aux fils de Séchem, aux fils de Hépher et aux fils de Sémida; ce sont là les enfants mâles de Manassé, fils de Joseph, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: There was also a lot for the rest of the children of Manasseh by their families; for the children of Abiezer, and for the children of Helek, and for the children of Asriel, and for the children of Shechem, and for the children of Hepher, and for the children of Shemida: these were the male children of Manasseh the son of Joseph by their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vul naga kaw mi gurona vi Manase segena, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya, kay gurona vi Abiyezer, gurona vi Helek, gurona vi Asriyel, gurona vi Sikem, gurona vi Hefer, gurona vi Semida: Kayni si guro sa jufayna vi Manase, goora vi Yosef, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya.
Bulu: Bone be Manasé bevok be nga nyoñe fe ngap, avalʼane mebume map me né: bone bʼAbiézer, bone bʼElék, bone bʼAsriél, bone be Sikem, bone bʼEfér, bone be Semida, mbe be mbe bobefam be Manasé, e mone Yôsep.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Manase mekelemeye, li taŋ mulumam vur muyo vur muyo na, i muy ngi Abiyezerey, ngi helekey, ngi Asriyeley, ngi Sekemey, ngi Heferey waɗ ngi Semidahay. Hanayna i dideˀ ngi Manasehey cek vur muyo vur muyo Manase, mangal ngi Zozef.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Manassa luttuɓe keɓi geɗal muuɗum'en haa hiirnaaŋge Urdun, kur'u ta'ani ɓe ɗum. Ɗum yimɓe ci'e Abi'ezer e Helek e Asriyel e Sikem e Hefer e Semida. Ɓe fuu ɓe danygol Manassa ɓii Yusufu.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Manassa luttuɓe keɓi geɗal muuɗum'en haa hiirnaaŋge Urdun, kur'u ta'ani ɓe ɗum. Ɗum yimɓe ci'e Abi'ezer e Helek e Asriyel e Sikem e Hefer e Semida. Ɓe fuu ɓe danygol Manassa ɓii Yusufu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nù ko o ŋma bem ko Manase nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. O bem nɔ‘i nɛ o bem ko Abiezɛr, o bem ko Helɛk, o bem ko Azriɛl, o bem ko Sɛkɛm, o bem ko Hefɛr, in o bem ko Semida, wen nɛ tɔ̧ o be wiwii ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nù ko o ŋma bem ko Manase nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. O bem nɔ‘i nɛ o bem ko Abiezɛr, o bem ko Helɛk, o bem ko Azriɛl, o bem ko Sɛkɛm, o bem ko Hefɛr, in o bem ko Semida, wen nɛ tɔ̧ o be wiwii ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mbeli kendeke nda hɛɗi ke kweci ŋwalea Manasɛ kala yɛ peləa nci, kezha ŋwalea Abiyɛzɛr, ŋa Hɛlɛk, ŋa Asriyɛl, ŋa Shɛkɛm, ŋa Hɛfɛr, ŋa Shemiday: ghenci ya kaŋwale tezhilia Manasɛ, wəzege ta Zhozɛf, kala yɛ peləa nci.
Tupurri: AÈ caa tway go ne jar ni Manase ma lan wo go de ngaäge ti moobe ta'ta' lay. AÈ caa ne jar ni Abiyeser wo, ne jar ni Heleg wo, ne jar ni Asriyel wo, ne jar ni Sikem wo, ne jar ni Hefer wo, ne jar ni Semida wo. Wo mo äuy na diñ weere ma twerpiiri mani Manase je ni Josef wo, go ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: Salphaad, fils de Hépher, fils de Galaad, fils de Machir, fils de Manassé, n'eut pas de fils, mais il eut des filles, et voici les noms de ses filles: Maala, Noa, Hégla, Melcha et Thersa.
Anglais: But Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, had no sons, but daughters: and these are the names of his daughters, Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Selofkad, goora vi Hefer, goora vi Galaad, goora vi Makir, goora vi Manase, nam may fi guro sa jufayɗi, may si guro-boyna. Semda visi kayni: Mahla, Nowa, Hogla, Milka hiɗi Tirsa.
Bulu: Telôfad e mone Efer e mone Galad, e mone Makir, e mone Manasé a nji biaé monafam ve bobebinga, be too môé na: Mala, Nôa, Ogla, Milka a Tirsa.
Guiziga: Selofat, mangal ngi Hefer, dideˀ ngi Galaˀat, Galaˀat i mangal ngi Makir, yo Selofat vuna i dideˀ ngi poprok ngi Manase ma. Naŋ a yi ziri mizilehey ta, sey ziri mongosohoy si. Ziri mongoso tayna slimiɗ taŋhay ani: Mala, Noa, Hogla, Milka waɗ Tirsa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Celofhad ɓii Hefer ɓii Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa, o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala e No'a e Hogila e Milka e Tirsa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Celofhad ɓii Hefer ɓii Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa, o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala e No'a e Hogila e Milka e Tirsa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛlɔfɛhad, bem ko Hɛfɛr, be-koo Galad nɛ duka nɛ́ bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase, bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na. Kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ; nin be-okoo nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛlɔfɛhad, bem ko Hɛfɛr, be-koo Galad nɛ duka nɛ́ bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase, bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na. Kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ; nin be-okoo nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Selofad nya kenza kawəzege ta Hɛfɛr, wəzege ta Gala'ad, wəzege ta Makir, wəzege ta Manasɛ ne, kekemave ŋwale tezhili ŋkɛ we, ama ŋwalea kwɛ ya ve, wa nyi sləa nci nyi: Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka ba'a Tirsa.
Tupurri: Selofod je ni Hefer, moo Galad, didi Makir ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen biñ weel ma twar gaè. Se biñ diñ mayre tawa. AÈ ëe ra ga Mahla, Nao, Hogla, Milka wo de Tirsa.

Francais: Elles se présentèrent devant Eléazar, le prêtre, devant Josué, fils de Nun, et devant les princes, en disant: «Yahweh a commandé à Moïse de nous donner un héritage parmi nos frères.» Et on leur donna, selon l'ordre de Yahweh, un héritage au milieu des frères de leur père.
Anglais: And they came near before Eleazar the priest, and before Joshua the son of Nun, and before the princes, saying, The  Lord  commanded Moses to give us an inheritance among our brethren. Therefore according to the commandment of the  Lord  he gave them an inheritance among the brethren of their father.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi co vok mul-ma-ɗifinna Eliyazar, vok Yosuwa goora vi Nun, vok sa Yerimana kaw, nisi disiya: Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus ala nigi ma vulma voco'o jar guro-biyomana. ki kayn nala nisi vulsi voco'o jar guro-biyom busina ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagat nala.
Bulu: Ane be nga zu be Ntuni Eléazar, asu be Yasua mona Nun, a asu bivet, a jô na: Nti a nga bendé Môze na: A ve bia ngabe si e zañe bobejañ. Nde be nga ve be ngap e zañe bobenyañ bʼésaa wop, avalʼane abendé Nti e mbe.
Guiziga: Ziri mongoso tayna a soko ng'avu masay Elazar, ng'avu Zozuwe, mangal ngi Nun waɗ ng'avu buyɓi ngi wuzla mizli, a ɓaka taŋ na: «Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa Moyise le ɗaˀ le, ɓa a vula ndra hirwuy mi ngi ndra a wuzla ngi sukum ndra mizileheye ya.» Dar a vulaka taŋ mi nga taŋ a wuzla jamba taŋhaya, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe ngari haa Eli'azaaru limanjo e Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna e ardiiɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo umri Muusa o hokka min geɗal lesdi caka banndiraaɓe amin worɓe.” Fodde umroore Jawmiraawo nde'e ɓe keɓi geɗal lesdi caka wappanyɓe maɓɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe ngari haa Eli'azaaru limanjo e Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna e ardiiɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo umri Muusa o hokka min geɗal lesdi caka banndiraaɓe amin worɓe.” Fodde umroore Jawmiraawo nde'e ɓe keɓi geɗal lesdi caka wappanyɓe maɓɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɛɛ tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar, ti Josue bem ko Nun in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ ha̧ ŋma mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ mgbara o nya yɛ.» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mgbara o nya ko dáà kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɛɛ tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar, ti Josue bem ko Nun in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ ha̧ ŋma mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ mgbara o nya yɛ.» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mgbara o nya ko dáà kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ se kasləyi nde dzeghe Shala Ɛlazar, Zhozəwɛ wəzege ta Nəwn ba'a mbelia jama, ma ke hɛ sha hɛ: «Nahe Mahwətə kegezave nda ke Moyize kezha ŋa n'yɛ ŋkwa mbeli hwa ka kesaka yiteyɛa yiteyɛ n'yɛ.» Pa mbeli ŋave nda ke hɛ hwa kweci hwelefefia nci kala nya gezeke Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Saara ndu da' Eleyasar je sië jagn wo de Josuwe je ni Nun wo de wañre ma pel jar Israyeln wo day riñ ra wo ga no: Manwur hay wii Moyis we go ga aà mo car tway ne wuur yoo heçeçre wuurn wo lay. Diñ wersen aè raw caa tway ne hara yoo kawre äaaran wo do maga Manwur hay waçaç nono.

Francais: Il échut dix portions à Manassé, outre le pays de Galaad et de Basan, qui
Anglais: And there fell ten portions to Manasseh, beside the land of Gilead and Bashan, which were on the other side Jordan;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nisi vul ir liyn doogo mi Manase hiɗi ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta, kayn di ala nagata vi Galaad hiɗi Basan goy gal hena vi Yordan may ŋaɓay hayɗi.
Bulu: Be nga ve Manasé mengab awôm a mboon asimba , te lañe Galad a Basañ e Yordane yat.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, dideˀ ngi Manaseheye, a lumam hirwuy mi nga taŋ le taˀ taˀ kuruˀu, jom ng'avu Galaˀat ati Basaŋ misi a dubazaw Zurdeŋ na ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii lenyol Manassa ɓesdanaama geɗe sappo dow Gile'at e Baasan gaɗa Urdun.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii lenyol Manassa ɓesdanaama geɗe sappo dow Gile'at e Baasan gaɗa Urdun.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ zika-nù ɓu ha̧ Manase e zu Galad in Basaŋ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ zika-nù ɓu ha̧ Manase e zu Galad in Basaŋ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli ndeke nda ŋkwa meŋe ke mbelia Manasɛ laka sla kwasheghediɗi, kadzevare yɛ Gala'ad le Bashan nyi pelɛ kema ta Zhəwrdɛŋe.
Tupurri: AÈ caa ngeel ti' ti' hwal ne jar ni Manase wo ciñ ti sir äaara maga sen le go Galaad wo de Basañ faale Jurdeçeç äañlan mo pa no.

Francais: est de l'autre côté du Jourdain. Car les filles de Manassé reçurent un héritage au milieu de ses fils: le pays de Galaad fut pour les autres fils de Manassé.
Anglais: Because the daughters of Manasseh had an inheritance among his sons: and the rest of Manasseh's sons had the land of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-boyna vi Manase fi vocota jar gurona valamu sa jufayna. Nagata vi Galaad na' hin mi gurona vi Manase segena.
Bulu: Amu bobebinga be Manasé be nga nyoñe ngap e zañe bobefame bé, a Galad a mbe asu bobefam be Manasé bevok.
Guiziga: Naŋ kanah ma, angi sukwi ngi Manase na, ko ziri mongosohoy kwana, a lumam hirwuy mi nga taŋ le a wuzla ziri mizileheye ya. Amma hirwuy Galaˀata, i ngi dideˀ mekelemey ngi Manase ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam rewɓe nder danygol maako boo ndoni lesdi bana deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en worɓe. Ammaa lesdi Gile'at laatani yimɓe Manassa luttuɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam rewɓe nder danygol maako boo ndoni lesdi bana deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en worɓe. Ammaa lesdi Gile'at laatani yimɓe Manassa luttuɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be-okoo ko Manase kpaa mɔɔ-oi mgbara o bu̧i̧-nya-wa, ɓɛɛ nú Galad duk nɛ́ ko o ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be-okoo ko Manase kpaa mɔɔ-oi mgbara o bu̧i̧-nya-wa, ɓɛɛ nú Galad duk nɛ́ ko o ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Keneheve nda hɛɗi mbeli deke ke ŋwale tezhili Manasɛ we, ama pa le ŋwalea kwɛa ŋkɛ. Ma hɛɗia Gala'ad ne, ŋa kweci ŋwale tezhilia Manasɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Werga aè caa tway ne ma tnaare ma ti wer mani Manasen wo yoo heçeçre äaara ma twerpiirin wo lay. Sir ma Galaad go diñ ma jar ni Manase ma lan wo lay.

Francais: La limite de Manassé partait d'Aser vers Machméthath, qui est en face de Sichem, et la frontière allait à droite, vers les habitants d'En-Taphua.
Anglais: And the coast of Manasseh was from Asher to Michmethah, that lieth before Shechem; and the border went along on the right hand unto the inhabitants of En–tappuah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar nagata vi Manase, fokis hay Aser ta-ta hay Mikmeta, ta ka goy vok Sikem, na' kal hay Yamin kat sum sa hay Eyin-Tappuwa.
Bulu: Nnéa si Manasé a nga taté Azér a kui Mikméta, zôsôô a Sikem, a siliki e yamim, mfaʼa bôte ya Eyin-Tapua be too.
Guiziga: Maakway ngi Manase a zli zle angi hirwuy ngi Aser hã a Mikmeta, misek duba cakay ati Sikem, tisi pas ngi miprik naŋ, a jik jik ti Mikmeta nga Yamin, hã a hay mizli En-Tapuwahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Keerol yimɓe Manassa yehi diga Aser haa Mikmetat, tiitotirŋgol bee Sikem. Nden ngol yehi gal fombina haa yimɓe En-Tappuha.
Fulfulde_DC: Keerol yimɓe Manassa yehi diga Aser haa Mikmetat, tiitotirŋgol bee Sikem. Nden ngol yehi gal fombina haa yimɓe En-Tappuha.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsí-nù  ko Manase ku̧ naŋ Asɛr hɔ nɛnɛ Mikmɛtat mgbák ti Sikɛm, ɓɛɛ ɓir hi̧i̧ si war Yamim tɛ o bíí Ɛin-Tapua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsí-nù  ko Manase ku̧ naŋ Asɛr hɔ nɛnɛ Mikmɛtat mgbák ti Sikɛm, ɓɛɛ ɓir hi̧i̧ si war Yamim tɛ o bíí Ɛin-Tapua.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ghala ta hɛɗia Manasɛ ne, se mɛa Asɛr hwa'a mbe Mikmɛtat, laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea Sishɛm. Kadzawa nde bela kwa zeme, laka mbeli nyi te hɛɗia Ɛn-Tapəwa.
Tupurri: Hagu Manase mañ le de Aser ka' haçaç wo go Mikmetad maga kar de Sikem mono. Se le' go Yamim nen ni jar ma En-Tapuwan wo no kay no.

Francais: Le territoire de Taphua échut à Manassé, mais Taphua sur la frontière de Manassé, était aux fils d'Ephraïm.
Anglais: Now Manasseh had the land of Tappuah: but Tappuah on the border of Manasseh belonged to the children of Ephraim;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata vi Tappuwa na' vi gurona vi Manase, may Tappuwa hay jaara vi Manase na' vi gurona vi Efrayim.
Bulu: E si é nga bômane Tapua é mbe jôme bone be Manasé, ve Tapua émien a mbe jôme bone bʼEfrayim.
Guiziga: Hirwuy Tapuwa i ngi Manase, amma walahay naŋ misi angi maakwaya, i ngi mizli ngi Efrayimey ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lesdi Tappuha laatani Manassa, ammaa Tappuha haa keerol Manassa laatani yimɓe Efrayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Lesdi Tappuha laatani Manassa, ammaa Tappuha haa keerol Manassa laatani yimɓe Efrayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú Tapua duka so nɛ́ ko Manase, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ye Tapua duk nɛ zu  gbìsì  ga, wa ha̧a̧ a̧ ha̧ o bem ko Efraim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú Tapua duka so nɛ́ ko Manase, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ye Tapua duk nɛ zu  gbìsì  ga, wa ha̧a̧ a̧ ha̧ o bem ko Efraim.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hɛɗia Tapəwa ne, ŋa mbelia Manasɛ ŋkɛ, ama Tapəwa nya kameleme nya kwa ghala le Manasɛ ne, ŋa ŋwalea Ɛfrayim ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ngeel ma ti Tapuwan äuy diñ ma jar ni Manase wo. Tapuwa de see äe ciñ ti hagu no ane se diñ ma jar ni Efrayim wo.

Francais: La limite descendait au torrent de Cana, au midi du torrent; les villes de cette région, échues à Ephraïm, étaient au milieu des villes de Manassé; et la limite de Manassé était au nord du torrent et aboutissait à la mer.
Anglais: And the coast descended unto the river Kanah, southward of the river: these cities of Ephraim are among the cities of Manasseh: the coast of Manasseh also was on the north side of the river, and the outgoings of it were at the sea:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara jik hay niy-ma-riŋŋa vi Kana, hay gal ma kayamna vi niy-ma-riŋŋa. Hoyok-ziy namna nam vi Efrayim, hay jar hoyok-ziyna vi Manase. Jaara vi Manase hay gal ma gaana vi niy-ma-riŋŋa co kat niy-lum ma ŋolla.
Bulu: Nnéa si ate a nga siliki ôtôñe kana, mfaʼa ya nké. Bitison bite bi mbe ngabe Efrayim, ézezañe bitison bi Manasé. Nnéa si Manasé ôtôñ akôé a nga vame mañ.
Guiziga: Maakway a jik jik kini nga mizaw Kana, kini tir vay ruwuy naŋ. Walahay tayna misi a wuzla walahay ngi Manasehey na, i ngi mizli ngi Efrayimey. Maakway ngi mizli ngi Manaseheye, tir vay muŋ ngi mizaw, waɗ ara kiɗ mi a mi mubuliy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden keerol diirti haa maayel Kana. Gure haa fombina maagel laatani Efrayim haa nder maral Manassa. Keerol tokki wakeere maayel woylaare, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden keerol diirti haa maayel Kana. Gure haa fombina maagel laatani Efrayim haa nder maral Manassa. Keerol tokki wakeere maayel woylaare, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira tik zu be-zer Kana nɛ ká̧ zaŋ-aa nɛ war ɗɔɔ. Mɔ kpɔk, ye nɛ ya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ha̧ be-zer'i tɛ nù ko Manase duka nɛ́ ko o be Efraim.  Gbìsì  duka ká̧ zaŋ be-zer'i ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ war ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kaɗi nú Gba-tɔp.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira tik zu be-zer Kana nɛ ká̧ zaŋ-aa nɛ war ɗɔɔ. Mɔ kpɔk, ye nɛ ya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ha̧ be-zer'i tɛ nù ko Manase duka nɛ́ ko o be Efraim.  Gbìsì  duka ká̧ zaŋ be-zer'i ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ war ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kaɗi nú Gba-tɔp.
Kapsiki_DC: Kadzawa ghala shɛ laka hələa Kana nya laka bela kwa zeme. Ma meleme ta ŋkɛ nyi jama jama ne, ŋa Ɛfrayim hɛ. Ndagwara te hɛɗia Manasɛ hɛ. Kadzawa nde laka bela kwa gwela ta hələ kezha zhigə kwa ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ.
Tupurri: Hagu tway mani jar ni Manasen mañ le de jag pyew ma Kana ma äañ waçyban no. Ane äi leege maga wo ti jeñ pyewn ni wo diñ ma jar ni Efrayim wo. Hagu äaara ma äañ gloñhwede ur le ti pyewn ka' le' wo go ti maarog ma kluu no.

Francais: Ainsi le pays au midi était à Ephraïm, et le pays au nord à Manassé, et la mer formait sa frontière. Vers le nord, ils touchaient à Aser, vers l'orient à Issachar.
Anglais: Southward it was Ephraim's, and northward it was Manasseh's, and the sea is his border; and they met together in Asher on the north, and in Issachar on the east.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata ta gal kayamta na' vi Efrayim, ta gal gaata vi Manase; niy-lum ma ŋolla mi jaara visiya; nisi jik kat Aser hay gal ma gaana, kat Isakar hay gal ma kuɗuwna kaw.
Bulu: Efuse si ya nké é mbe ji Efrayim, ji ya akôé kik é too ji Manasé, mañ me too be zañ; be nga nnambe éfuse si Azér mfaʼa yʼakôé, éfuse si Isakar mfaʼa jôp da tôô.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, sukwi ngi Efrayime, naŋ tir vay ruwuy, yo ngi Manase kwana, naŋ tir vay muŋ naŋ. Maakway taŋ, i mubuliy miɓaˀ ar wala. Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, i sukwi ngi Aser. Yo tisi pas ngi miprik naŋ kwana, i sukwi ngi Isakar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa fombina maayel man, Efrayim mari lesdi, haa woyla boo Manassa. Mbeela laati keerol le'i ɗiɗi fuu haa hiirnaaŋge. Haa woyla walaadu hiirnaaŋge ɓe njokki lesdi Aser, haa woyla walaadu fuunaaŋge boo lesdi Issakar.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa fombina maayel man, Efrayim mari lesdi, haa woyla boo Manassa. Mbeela laati keerol le'i ɗiɗi fuu haa hiirnaaŋge. Haa woyla walaadu hiirnaaŋge ɓe njokki lesdi Aser, haa woyla walaadu fuunaaŋge boo lesdi Issakar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Efraim a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ Manase a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn. Gba-tɔp duka nɛ́  gbìsì  kɔ-wa nɛ̀ war yee-wese. Asɛr duka nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ Isakar a̧a̧ nɛ̀ daŋa-wese.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Efraim a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ Manase a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn. Gba-tɔp duka nɛ́  gbìsì  kɔ-wa nɛ̀ war yee-wese. Asɛr duka nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ Isakar a̧a̧ nɛ̀ daŋa-wese.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka bela kwa zeme ne, Ɛfrayim ya kaghala. Ma laka bela kwa gwela ne, Manasɛ. Ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ ya kaghala ta nci nya laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci. Kakwaɗe Asɛr ŋkɛ laka bela kwa gwela ba'a Isakar laka same ta veci.
Tupurri: Sir Efrayim hay go äañ waçybane, sir Manase hay go äañ gloñhwede mañ le hagu de Asere, ma nen wur bo toñn go hagu de Isakar lay.

Francais: Manassé obtint dans les territoires d'Issachar et d'Aser Bethsan et les villes de sa dépendance, Jéblaam et les villes de sa dépendance, les habitants de Dor et les villes de sa dépendance, les habitants d'Endor et les villes de sa dépendance, les habitants de Thénac et les villes de sa dépendance, les habitants de Mageddo et les villes de sa dépendance: c'est le district des trois Collines.
Anglais: And Manasseh had in Issachar and in Asher Beth–shean and her towns, and Ibleam and her towns, and the inhabitants of Dor and her towns, and the inhabitants of Endor and her towns, and the inhabitants of Taanach and her towns, and the inhabitants of Megiddo and her towns, even three countries.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti nagata vi Manase ta ka hay liyna vi Isakar hiɗi Aser: Bet-Seyan hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, Yibleyam hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, sum sa hay Dor hiɗi naga ma kuɗsina, sum sa hay Eyin-Dor hiɗi naga ma kuɗsina, sum sa hay Taanak hiɗi naga ma kuɗsina, sum sa hay Megiddo hiɗi naga ma kuɗsina. Ir liyn ɦidi.
Bulu: Bifuse bi si Isakar a Azér été, Manasé a nga bili: Bétséan a bitison bi nga tii a nye, Yiblim a bitisone bié, bôte ya Dor a bitisone bié, bôte ya Eyin-Dor a bitisone bié, bôte ya Tanak a bitisone bié, bôte ya Megidô a bitisone bié: ngoto éla.
Guiziga: Angi hirwuy ngi Isakar ati ngi Asere, Manase a lum mi nga naŋ angi taŋ, i walahayay Bet-Seyaŋ ati Ibleyam, jom ati prok ngi ciki taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ. Yo waɗ walahay Dor, En-Dor, Taˀanak, Megido, jom ti mizli ngir taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma, mbiɗeˀvra, prokoy walahay Dor ngir li micay miwa miwa gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa nder maral Issakar e Aser, Manassa heɓi berniiji ɗi'i: Bayti-Se'an e Yible'am bee gure maaji, non boo Door e En-Door e Ta'anak e Megiddo bee gure maaji. Ɗum waɗi taƴe lesdi tati.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa nder maral Issakar e Aser, Manassa heɓi berniiji ɗi'i: Bayti-Se'an e Yible'am bee gure maaji, non boo Door e En-Door e Ta'anak e Megiddo bee gure maaji. Ɗum waɗi taƴe lesdi tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manase a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o ye tɛ zika-nù ko Isakar in ko Asɛr mbɛt: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Yiblɛam, Dɔr, wan mɛ ká̧ zaŋ yì, Ɛn-Dɔr, Tanak in Mɛgido, in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa, in o zu-kaya taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manase a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o ye tɛ zika-nù ko Isakar in ko Asɛr mbɛt: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Yiblɛam, Dɔr, wan mɛ ká̧ zaŋ yì, Ɛn-Dɔr, Tanak in Mɛgido, in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa, in o zu-kaya taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe ŋa Isakar ba'a ŋa Asɛr ne, nahe Manasɛ kekemave meleme bake: Bɛt-Shɛyan ba'a Iblɛyam nyi kaŋa ka Dor, tsagha kweci meleme nyi dzeyi yitea Dor, Ɛn-Dor, Ta'anak ba'a Mɛgido le mbeli nyi mbe hɛ, tsagha meleme nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ, geze ta ŋkɛ, ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yitea Dor.
Tupurri: Äi leege ma jar ni Manase hay wo go ti tway mani jar ni Isakar wo de Aser ni pa. Äi leege sen wo diñ Bet-Seyan de progre äen wo, Yibleyam de progre äen wo, Dor de progre äen wo, En-Dor de progre äen wo, Taanag de progre äen wo, Megido wo de progre äen wo. Sir ma kluuri ti'ti' swa'a.

Francais: Les fils de Manassé ne purent pas prendre possession de ces villes, et les Chananéens s'enhardirent à rester dans ce pays.
Anglais: Yet the children of Manasseh could not drive out the inhabitants of those cities; but the Canaanites would dwell in that land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Manase may yaw naga namna lakŋɗi, sum sa Kanaaniyana mini kay lak ziy hay naga namna.
Bulu: Bone be Manasé be nji bo nguleya nyoñe bitisone bite, a bôte ya Kanaan be nga kômbô tabe si éte.
Guiziga: Amma so na, walahay tayna gar na, dideˀ ngi Manasehey a tiɓaka taŋ da taŋ gu ta. Kanaˀanay a cicam kaŋ kaŋ, sey ɓa a cifam ar walahay tayna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa yimɓe Manassa mbaawaay riiwugo jooɗiiɓe nder berniiji ɗi'i, ngam maajum Kanaani'en tokki jooɗaago ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa yimɓe Manassa mbaawaay riiwugo jooɗiiɓe nder berniiji ɗi'i, ngam maajum Kanaani'en tokki jooɗaago ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bezaŋ Manase ba so ye nɔ‘i ga na, o be Kanaŋ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bezaŋ Manase ba so ye nɔ‘i ga na, o be Kanaŋ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama shaŋe ŋwalea Manasɛ kaŋka ka Kanan nyi mbe melemea shɛhɛ, mba hɛ le nza te hɛɗia shɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Manase joñ wo de eegre ma yaçaç äi leege sen wo gaè. Jar Kanaan dur wo mbaara maga saara mo joñ de tiñ äi leege sen wo ëa.

Francais: Lorsque les enfants d'Israël furent plus forts, ils soumirent les Chananéens à un tribut, mais ils ne les chassèrent pas.
Anglais: Yet it came to pass, when the children of Israel were waxen strong, that they put the Canaanites to tribute; but did not utterly drive them out.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma sum sa Israyella muɗ dono muɗna, nisi li sum sa Kanaaniyan gorvo'o, may nisi as kay digiɗsi goyɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe bone bʼIsraél be nga bo ngul abime da yian, ane be nga timili bôte ya Kanaan alo, ve be nji ke wôlé be bitisone biap.
Guiziga: Ko ti Israyeley mitiram gidaŋ haɗa na tekeɗe kwana, a ɓulaka taŋ avra gu ta na si. Amma sey a tikakaˀay da Kanaˀanaya, ɓa a gam slra mitakˀay ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Isra'iila'en ɓesdi semmbe, ɓe laatini Kanaani'en maccuɓe maɓɓe ngam huuwango ɓe, ɓe ndiiwaay ɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Isra'iila'en ɓesdi semmbe, ɓe laatini Kanaani'en maccuɓe maɓɓe ngam huuwango ɓe, ɓe ndiiwaay ɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o be  Israɛl  kpaa ŋgai kaɗi, wa dee ha̧ o be Kanaŋ mɛ de tom ha̧ wa géè, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm so ndaka wa yinɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o be  Israɛl  kpaa ŋgai kaɗi, wa dee ha̧ o be Kanaŋ mɛ de tom ha̧ wa géè, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm so ndaka wa yinɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ya kwela kemave berete ka Israyɛl ne, keŋkamte hɛ hɛ we, pa hɛ zhɛrete ka Kanan shɛ kaka mavashi kemene nda slene ke hɛ.
Tupurri: De maga jar Israyel kol wo go de eegre mono, saara kol jar Kanaan wo go gebere ane saara joñ de eegre ma nii rage go gaè.

Francais: Les fils de Joseph parlèrent à Josué, en disant: «Pourquoi ne m'as-tu donné en héritage qu'un seul lot, une seule part alors que je suis un peuple nombreux et que Yahweh a béni jusqu'à présent?»
Anglais: And the children of Joseph spake unto Joshua, saying, Why hast thou given me but one lot and one portion to inherit, seeing I am a great people, forasmuch as the  Lord  hath blessed me hitherto?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yosef di tam Yosuwa ala: Numa ŋolo ta-ta vaydi, kay Ma-Vatɗina gi bolawa kuma'a. May naŋ vulmat mi ir liyn kep ɦawa kay mige?
Bulu: Ane bone be Yôsep be nga kobô Yasua na: Amu jé ô nga ve bia vôme wua ane ngap, abôta si da, bi ke bi too abime beta ayoñe bôte di, amu Nti a botaneya bia a kui éyoñe ji?
Guiziga: Akẽh na, dideˀ ngi Zozefey a soko ng'avu Zozuwe, a ɓakaŋ na: «Ani ndra na, Bumbulvuŋ a ɗuwula ndra mi le. Vurˀe, ndra ani haɗa teˀe. Na ki sla ndra hirwuyo da ndra purla tewle si mbrike?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe danygol Yusufu mbi'i Yosuwa: “Ngam ɗume a hokki min geɗal gootal tan haa lesdi? Min ɗuuɗɓe masin, ngam Jawmiraawo barkiɗini min.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe danygol Yusufu mbi'i Yosuwa: “Ngam ɗume a hokki min geɗal gootal tan haa lesdi? Min ɗuuɗɓe masin, ngam Jawmiraawo barkiɗini min.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jozɛf tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ ge? Bo nɛ bíí k’ɛɛ ɔ dɔka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ toka so nɛ de yoŋgo h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga na nde?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jozɛf tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ ge? Bo nɛ bíí k’ɛɛ ɔ dɔka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ toka so nɛ de yoŋgo h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga na nde?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ŋwalea Zhozɛf sha Zhozəwɛ: «Wa raberə nda ndeke n'yɛ bela ta hɛɗi na kwetɛŋe, ndagwara nahe Mahwətə kewəpikɛ n'yɛ ba'a keseghete n'yɛ kwele kwele wa?»
Tupurri: Jar ni Josef kal wo wii Josuwe ga no: Manwur de kañ bosa' ne wuur ti, wuur de tesge debañ haçaç wara. Wer mayse ga ndo caa tway ne wuur no me' no day se boñ tu pa la?

Francais: Josué leur dit: «Si tu es un peuple nombreux, monte à la forêt, et là défriche-toi une place dans le pays des Phérézéens et des Rephaïm, puisque la montagne d'Ephraïm est trop étroite pour toi.»
Anglais: And Joshua answered them, If thou be a great people, then get thee up to the wood country, and cut down for thyself there in the land of the Perizzites and of the giants, if mount Ephraim be too narrow for thee.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa di tisiya: La nigi ka ŋol dak-daki, tuɗgi kuɗ juruta, nigi ma par liyna kay li ziy hay nagata vi sum sa Feresiyena hiɗi sa Refayimna, kay hiɗiyta vi sa Efrayimna kayni na' hebay ŋolo kigiya.
Bulu: Yasua a nga yalane be na: Nge mi ne beta ayoñe bôt, kelan afan, a li vôm éziñ e sii Beférézieñ a Berefayim, amu nkôl Efrayim ô dañeya wo ôbametan.
Guiziga: Zozuwe a mbiɗa taŋ di: «Ki puraka na, kum haɗa teˀe, yo hirwuy vay muwã Efrayim a ndilukum ngi cife ta. Da kine na, ngam hirnga kini nga wuzlaɓuh, ɓa ki ra slam li angi hirwuy ngi Perizihey ati ngi Refay na, da kum ava.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yosuwa wi'i ɓe: “To on ɗuuɗi bana nii, to kooseeje Efrayim ke'aay on, nden kam njehe nder laynde lesdi Perezzi'en e Refa'en, on mbaɗana ko'e mon gese ton.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yosuwa wi'i ɓe: “To on ɗuuɗi bana nii, to kooseeje Efrayim ke'aay on, nden kam njehe nder laynde lesdi Perezzi'en e Refa'en, on mbaɗana ko'e mon gese ton.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josue kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si zika-nù nɛ te ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɔ́í kombo sɛn nù ko o be Periz in ko o be Refaim, wen nɛ kaya Efraim gasi wen'nɛ́ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josue kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si zika-nù nɛ te ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɔ́í kombo sɛn nù ko o be Periz in ko o be Refaim, wen nɛ kaya Efraim gasi wen'nɛ́ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozəwɛ sha hɛ: «Ma kenza nde mbeli nyi kwele kwele yɛ ba'a kenza nde dewə ŋayɛ ghweme ta Ɛfrayim ne, dzeme mə laka ghala ta ka Pɛrɛs ba'a ŋa ka Refay, tsəhwə mə ŋkwa mbe gamba.»
Tupurri: Josuwe kal ferge ne hara ga no: Hayga nday ngaäa day huuli ma Efrayim de peçeç wee ge no, see wee wo yooway mani jar Feresid wo de jar Refayim wo, ni nday po' wee ngeel wo ni.

Francais: Les fils de Joseph dirent: «La montagne ne nous suffit pas, et il y a des chariots de fer chez tous les Chananéens qui habitent le pays plat, chez ceux qui sont à Bethsan et dans les villes de sa dépendance, et chez ceux qui sont dans la vallée de Jezraël.»
Anglais: And the children of Joseph said, The hill is not enough for us: and all the Canaanites that dwell in the land of the valley have chariots of iron, both they who are of Beth–shean and her towns, and they who are of the valley of Jezreel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yosef di'e: Hiɗiyt may asmaɗi, lo keke-ma-duura ma kawayna ka hay ɓam sum sa Kanaaniyan kaf sa ka li ziy hay lokŋa, sa ka hay Bet-Seyan hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, sa ka hay lokŋa vi Yisreel kaw.
Bulu: Nde bone be Yôsep be nga jô na: Nkôle te ô se nguleya yiane bia; nalé fe na bevagoñ bityé be ne e be bôte bese ya Kanaan be too mbiʼili, ba be ne Bétséañ a bitisone bié, a ba be ne mbiʼili Yizrél.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Zozefey tuwa, a mbiɗakaŋ di: «Naŋ kanah, hirwuy muwã na, a ndila ndra ta gisiŋ gwat naŋ. Na ma na, mizli Kanaˀan ngir li micay vuna, taŋ ti mota ngi vurum ngi ɓirihey. Yo Kanaˀan ngi Bet-Seyaŋhay ati ngi prok taŋhay waɗ mekelemey ngir li micay ngi Zisreyel gar na, kanah ma.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njaabi: “Lesdi kooseeje he'ataa min. Ammaa Kanaani'en jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi leesndi mari mootaaji pucci njamndiiji, waato jooɗiiɓe haa Bayti-Se'an bee gure mum e wonɓe nder waadiwol Yisre'el fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njaabi: “Lesdi kooseeje he'ataa min. Ammaa Kanaani'en jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi leesndi mari mootaaji pucci njamndiiji, waato jooɗiiɓe haa Bayti-Se'an bee gure mum e wonɓe nder waadiwol Yisre'el fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jozɛf kifa nú woyo: «Kaya beka nyɛm yɛ na, in mbɛt, o be Kanaŋ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa-boi, o wan nɛ ɔ Bɛt-Seaŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o ye nɛ zii nɛ a̧, in o wan nɛ ɔ bɔkɔ-nú Yizreɛl mbɛt.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jozɛf kifa nú woyo: «Kaya beka nyɛm yɛ na, in mbɛt, o be Kanaŋ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa-boi, o wan nɛ ɔ Bɛt-Seaŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o ye nɛ zii nɛ a̧, in o wan nɛ ɔ bɔkɔ-nú Yizreɛl mbɛt.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ŋwalea Zhozɛf: «Katenza ghwemea shɛ wərə n'yɛ we. Ɓiyitsa ne, wəmata gədəwə kwa lɛ lɛ ya va ka kanan nyi kwake kwake ba'a nyi mbe Bɛt-Shɛyan, tsagha nyi mbe meleme nyi dzeyi yitea zlərəa Zhizrɛyɛl.»
Tupurri: Jar ni Josef kal wo ga no: Huulin kaçaç wuur gaa, ba äuy pa mono, jar Kanaan maga wo wo de tiñ äil logn wo de pus durgi boore do, maga wo wo Bet-Seyan wo de progre äen no, maga wo wo äil log ma Jisreyel mo äuy wo dosen no lay.

Francais: Josué répondit à la maison de Joseph, Ephraïm et Manassé: «Tu es un peuple nombreux, et ta force est grande; tu n'auras pas seulement un lot.
Anglais: And Joshua spake unto the house of Joseph, even to Ephraim and to Manasseh, saying, Thou art a great people, and hast great power: thou shalt not have one lot only:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa di tam jafna vi Efrayim hiɗi Manase gurona vi Yosef ala: Nigi kayni si sum sa biyay ŋolo, donota vigi kaw ŋolo, nigi ma fum mi gal ma kiɗay ɦawaɗi.
Bulu: Ajô te Yasua a nga jô nda Yôsep, Efrayim a Manasé na: Ô ne beta ayoñe bôt, a ngule jôé é ne anen, woo ye ke nyoñ éfuse si é ne tyôtyoé.
Guiziga: Dar Zozuwe a ɓa mizli ngi wazlaray Zozefey, ti Efrayimey ati Manaseheye: «Kum i sukwi madiɗa, yo sukwi migidaŋ ma. Anja a slukum da kum i li taˀ purla tewle si ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yosuwa wi'i yimɓe Yusufu, le'i Efrayim e Manassa: “Fakat on ɗuuɗɓe, on semmbiɗɓe boo. On keɓan ko ɓuri geɗal gootal.
Fulfulde_DC: Yosuwa wi'i yimɓe Yusufu, le'i Efrayim e Manassa: “Fakat on ɗuuɗɓe, on semmbiɗɓe boo. On keɓan ko ɓuri geɗal gootal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be nutua ko Jozɛf, ha̧ Efraim in Manase: «Zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka in ɛnɛ ɔ ŋgaya mbɛt, ɛnɛ beka kpa nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be nutua ko Jozɛf, ha̧ Efraim in Manase: «Zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka in ɛnɛ ɔ ŋgaya mbɛt, ɛnɛ beka kpa nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozəwɛ sha mbelia Zhozɛf, yita ta Ɛfrayim ba'a kwa bake ta bela ta Manasɛ: «Kaganda nza yɛ kwele kwele ba'a keberete berete ŋayɛ, deke ŋkwa kwetɛŋe nde tenza va gheyɛ te hɛɗi nya we.
Tupurri: Josuwe kal wii jar ni Efrayim wo de Manase, jar ni Josef wo ga no: Nday ngaäa debañ, nday de eegre lay, tway äay joñ ge boñ tu gaè.

Francais: Car la montagne t'appartiendra; c'est une forêt, tu la défricheras, et les issues en seront à toi; car tu chasseras les Chananéens, quoiqu'ils aient des chars de fer et qu'ils soient forts.»
Anglais: But the mountain shall be thine; for it is a wood, and thou shalt cut it down: and the outgoings of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive out the Canaanites, though they have iron chariots, and though they be strong.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nigi ma fa' ti hiɗiyta, la ti juruta kaw, nigi ma para' goyo, nigi ma fi haya'a. Nigi ma digiɗ sa Kanaaniyan goyo, la keke-ma-duura visi ma kawayn ka'a, la donota visi ka'a kaw.
Bulu: Ve wo ye nyoñe nkôl, akôsa bo na nkôle te ô ne afan: wo ye baʼé bilé yʼété, a yene beta mfi été. Wo ye wôlé bôte ya Kanaan si jap, akôsa bo be bili bevagoñ bityé a, akôsa bo be ne ngulʼabui.
Guiziga: Amma hirwuy vay muwã, misi widisey ara ngiriɗ tekeɗe kwana, a sa slukum da kum i nah, kisa ngumaka. Kanaˀanaya, ko ti mota ngi vurum taŋ ngi ɓirihey ati gidaŋ taŋ mihaɗa na gar kwana, kisa ɓulaka taŋ gu na si.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lesdi towndiije laatanto on boo. Koo ɗum laynde, on pe'a nde, on mara lesdi man. Kanaani'en boo, koo to ɓe ngoodi mootaaji pucci njamndiiji, ɓe semmbiɗɓe, onon on ndiiwan ɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Lesdi towndiije laatanto on boo. Koo ɗum laynde, on pe'a nde, on mara lesdi man. Kanaani'en boo, koo to ɓe ngoodi mootaaji pucci njamndiiji, ɓe semmbiɗɓe, onon on ndiiwan ɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kaya nɛ duk nɛ kombo tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m te a nù, ɓɛɛ bɛɛ-aa lɛŋ duka nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ oi keekee-biro kɔ-wa in ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kaya nɛ duk nɛ kombo tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m te a nù, ɓɛɛ bɛɛ-aa lɛŋ duka nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ oi keekee-biro kɔ-wa in ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Katenza pɛtɛa ŋkwa nya hwa ghweme nya bətə va yɛ wəfe kaŋa ŋayɛ. Katetsəhwə ŋkwa shɛ yɛ ba'a katenza yɛ yimə dzeme hwe. Kateŋkamte ka Kanan yɛ ya ghenci nza le wəmata gədəwə nyi kalɛ ba'a ya ghenci nza berete beretenji.»
Tupurri: Huulin joñ ge mbe ma äay ko aà mo hay ba ga aà diñ yooway dra'a. Nday po'n ge yañ go day sir joñ ge yañ go diñ ma äay go ti jag äe leñleñ äuy. Gahaçyla, nday nii gi jar Kanaan wo yañ go, ba de maga aà wo de pus durgi boore noga wo de eegre mo äuy no.

Francais: Toute l'assemblée des enfants d'Israël se réunit à Silo, et ils y dressèrent la tente de réunion; le pays était soumis devant eux.
Anglais: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.
