BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tokŋa vi sa Israyel kaf dak hay Silo; nisi col guɗuk ma fi-tuwna ɗawni. Nagata ay sliy kisiya.
Bulu: Ane bôte bese yʼIsraél be nga sulan e Silô. Nde be nga lam ndʼéndelé bendôbaʼane valé, a koone na, si ése é ntoo éjôé jabe si.
Guiziga: Israyeley gar a tikaka ˀay le da hirwuy mitaˀ gar, akẽh na, a kusom cek cek a Silo. Joˀ a ng'aka guɗuk ngi zlir ti Buymisemuŋ a diga so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde yimɓe ummaatoore Isra'iila timmini nyaamugo lesdi, ɓe fuu ɓe mooɓi haa Silo. Ɓe ndarni laymaaru fottirde ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde yimɓe ummaatoore Isra'iila timmini nyaamugo lesdi, ɓe fuu ɓe mooɓi haa Silo. Ɓe ndarni laymaaru fottirde ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  lɛŋ mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn Silo, ɓɛɛ wa yai  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  e nù. Ŋgimbi'i ká wa baa nù kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  lɛŋ mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn Silo, ɓɛɛ wa yai  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  e nù. Ŋgimbi'i ká wa baa nù kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl tsenete geva mbe Silo, pa hɛ menete cɛ lekwesa kebegeme geva le Mahwətə. Pɛtɛa hɛɗi kafa nda ŋa nci ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel tay wo äuy äi leege Silo. Saara raw baa tiñ ma yiñgin de Baa ni. Sirn hay go nen do äaara.

Francais: Il restait sept tribus d'entre les enfants d'Israël qui n'avaient pas encore reçu leur héritage.
Anglais: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jafna vi sa Israyella sa bay fi ir vocota visi tuwana hini siɗiya.
Bulu: Valé meyoñ ya be be me ngenan te nyoñe ngabe si jap.
Guiziga: A wuzla Israyeley na, sukwihey a ndiram le tarnaˀ zleˀe, a lumam hirwuyo zleˀe t'aruŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Le'i joweeɗiɗi nder Isra'iila'en keɓaay geɗal muuɗum'en haa lesdi tawon.
Fulfulde_DC: Le'i joweeɗiɗi nder Isra'iila'en keɓaay geɗal muuɗum'en haa lesdi tawon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɛn mgbara o be  Israɛl , zuduk ɓɔna mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɛn mgbara o be  Israɛl , zuduk ɓɔna mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi na.
Kapsiki_DC: Mberefaŋe hwelefefi nyi kekemavema ŋa nci ŋkwa kaba hwa ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Äï¡ï¡ni jar Israyel ta' ta' renam hay bay wo de da' tway ma äaaran wa ëa.

Francais: Josué dit aux enfants d'Israël: «Jusques à quand négligerez-vous de prendre possession du pays que Yahweh, le Dieu de vos pères, vous a donné?
Anglais: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, How long are ye slack to go to possess the land, which the  Lord  God of your fathers hath given you?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa di tam sa Israyella: Nagata ta Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi sumaygi vulgita, nigi min li muray ta'a kayni, nigi ma tuɗ sla'a lancitige?
Bulu: Nde Yasua a nga jô bone bʼIsraél na: Mia ye bo njem a fianga ya nyoñe si Nti, e Zambe bʼésoo benan a veya mia akekui éyoñ évé?
Guiziga: Dar Zozuwe a ɓa Israyeleye: «Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ kumoyo a vulukum hirwuy hana le da kum. Ki pam anga t'aruŋ hã dana, ki kutukom mi ɗagay ka?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum Yosuwa ƴami Isra'iila'en: “Haa ndey on ɗon ndeena haa on njaha, on mara lesdi ndi Jawmiraawo, Allah baabiraaɓe mon hokki on?
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum Yosuwa ƴami Isra'iila'en: “Haa ndey on ɗon ndeena haa on njaha, on mara lesdi ndi Jawmiraawo, Allah baabiraaɓe mon hokki on?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ tɛ pɛm mɔ hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge sɛk’ɛnɛ nɛɛ mɛ́ bà nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧‘nɛ́ ge?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ tɛ pɛm mɔ hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge sɛk’ɛnɛ nɛɛ mɛ́ bà nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧‘nɛ́ ge?
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozəwɛ sha ka Israyɛl: «Wa yaneghe yɛ kezha kele hɛɗi nya ndeke ŋayɛ Shala Mahwətə ta ka yitehɛ ŋayɛ wa?
Tupurri: Josuwe day wii ra ga no: Nday joñ ge naw na gaçy gorge ma yaçaç sir maga Manwuri, Baa mani paçaçre äay hay haçn go wee mo la?

Francais: Choisissez trois hommes par tribu, et je les enverrai; ils se lèveront, parcourront le pays, le décriront en vue du partage et reviendront vers moi.
Anglais: Give out from among you three men for each tribe: and I will send them, and they shall rise, and go through the land, and describe it according to the inheritance of them; and they shall come again to me.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vilekgi sumun ɦidi kuɗ jafna jafna, nan min cuksi sunu. Nisi ma yaw kulo'o, ma ŋuy nagata, nisi ma ɓuraw nagata dig vocota visiya, bugolda nisi ma hotay tanu.
Bulu: Ayoñ ése é tobôk bôte belaa, a ma ye lôme be be ke bo jam éziñ: ba ye kôlô a wulu e si ése, a tili avalʼane mengap ya si éte me né, wôna, ba ye beta bulan e be ma.
Guiziga: Wunam mizli makir makir angi sukwi gar, ɓa yi sa slina taŋ. A sa slikiɗam, ara bulaka hirwuy vuna. A sa puraka mislaka vur sukwi vur sukwi bleŋ bleŋ, ɓa a sa sikiy ti ɓi nah, ani kahana kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Cuɓe worɓe tato tato nder le'i fuu. Mi nelan ɓe, ɓe ndaara lesdi fuu, ɓe mbinnda ndi deydey senndugo ndi, nden ɓe ngarta haa am.
Fulfulde_DC: Cuɓe worɓe tato tato nder le'i fuu. Mi nelan ɓe, ɓe ndaara lesdi fuu, ɓe mbinnda ndi deydey senndugo ndi, nden ɓe ngarta haa am.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók bíí taar tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tom wa ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ yar tɛ nù, wa tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ nyɛma yí-wa tɛ nu'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók bíí taar tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tom wa ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ yar tɛ nù, wa tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ nyɛma yí-wa tɛ nu'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsehave mə mbeli mahekene hwa yayata hwelefe, 'ya kateghwene hɛ yitea slene, kateslə hɛ ba'a kadzeghwamte hɛɗi hɛ kezha newe nza ta ŋkɛ, kehɛɗi kehɛɗi kele ɗa ghena hɛ kase.
Tupurri: Hoo wee jar ti äï¡ï¡nin wo swa' swa'a, ni ndi laa ra ma woge rañ sir no. AÀ kon ge wo yañ le day car wo äil äe yañ go, day saara fer yañ le da' ndi.

Francais: Ils le diviseront en sept portions; Juda restera dans ses frontières au midi, et la maison de Joseph restera dans ses frontières au nord.
Anglais: And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their coast on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their coasts on the north.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ma ɓuraw nagata ir siɗiya; jafna vi Yuda ma lak hay jaara visiya hay gal ma kayamna, jafna vi Yosef ma lak hay jaara visiya hay gal ma gaana may.
Bulu: Ba ye kabe je ngabe zamgbwa. Yuda a ye liʼi mfaʼa minné mié ya nké mi né, a nda Yôsep ja ye tabe e minné mié yʼakôé.
Guiziga: A sa wuɗkaka hirwuy vuna taˀ taˀ tarnaˀ. Mizli ngi Zudahaya, a sa ndiram ar li taŋ tir vay ruwuy. Yo mizli ngi Zozefey kwana, a sa ndiram ar li nga taŋ tir vay muŋ ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: En cenndan ndi geɓe  joweeɗiɗi. Yahuuda jooɗoto nder lesdi mum haa fombina. Yimɓe Yusufu boo njooɗoto nder lesdi muuɗum'en haa woyla.
Fulfulde_DC: En cenndan ndi geɓe  joweeɗiɗi. Yahuuda jooɗoto nder lesdi mum haa fombina. Yimɓe Yusufu boo njooɗoto nder lesdi muuɗum'en haa woyla.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛ̧ nù tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. O bezaŋ Juda tɛ duk tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ bezaŋ Jozɛf duka tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛ̧ nù tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. O bezaŋ Juda tɛ duk tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ bezaŋ Jozɛf duka tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Kapsiki_DC: Mberefaŋe mbe nehe hɛɗi hɛ mbe dzeghwa ta ncia shɛ: ma yita ta Zhəwda ne, kwa ghala ta ŋkɛ nza ŋkɛ laka bela kwa zeme, yita ta Zhozɛf ne, te ŋa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ laka bela kwa gwela.
Tupurri: AÀ car ge wo äil sirn yañ go ti'ti' renam. Jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan lag ge wo äil tway ma äaaran nen äañ waçyban lay, äï¡ï¡ni mani Josefn lag ge wo go äil äaaran nen äañ gloñhwede lay.

Francais: Vous donc, vous dresserez l'état du pays, en en faisant sept parts, et vous me l'apporterez ici; puis je jetterai pour vous le sort ici devant Yahweh, notre Dieu.
Anglais: Ye shall therefore describe the land into seven parts, and bring the description hither to me, that I may cast lots for you here before the  Lord  our God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nigi hayɗini, nigi ma ɓuraw nagat goy ir siɗiya, nigi ma maran ɓuraw na'ta tani, nan ma li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta tani kigiya vok ir Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vaya.
Bulu: Wôna, mia mia ye kaban abime si e liʼiya, tañe mengap zamgbwa, éyoñe te mia ye zu liti ma nkabane te, a ma ye bo asimba , asu denan asu be Nti, e Zambe wongan.
Guiziga: Hirwuy mitaˀ taˀ tarnaˀ na, ara puraka bleŋ bleŋ, ɓa ki sikiy ti ɓi nah, hana naŋ kahana, hana naŋ kahana. I sa ga ceregezleŋ a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ ndra aka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sey on mbinnda no geɓe lesdi man joweeɗiɗi mba'i, ngaddaneeɗam ɗum. Min mi waɗanan on kur'u ngam ƴamango on muuyo Allah Jawmiraawo men.
Fulfulde_DC: Sey on mbinnda no geɓe lesdi man joweeɗiɗi mba'i, ngaddaneeɗam ɗum. Min mi waɗanan on kur'u ngam ƴamango on muuyo Allah Jawmiraawo men.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i nyɛm nɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧. Mi tɛ pi̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i nyɛm nɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧. Mi tɛ pi̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Katekele ɗa ghena ta nza ta hɛɗi yɛ keghə keghə mberefaŋe kase teke. Kasla kwasheghediɗi 'ya teke kwa kema ta Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə, kezha yayata hwelefe ta ŋayɛ.
Tupurri: See wee, car wee äil sirn go ti'ti' renam ni nday a wee le da' ndi la. Ndi naa ge waçywaàale yañ go wee ti äe pel Manwuri, Baa naa la.

Francais: Car il n'y aura point de part pour les Lévites au milieu de vous, le sacerdoce de Yahweh étant leur héritage; et Gad, Ruben, et la demi-tribu de Manassé ont reçu de l'autre côté du Jourdain, à l'orient, leur héritage, que leur a donné Moïse, serviteur de Yahweh.»
Anglais: But the Levites have no part among you; for the priesthood of the  Lord  is their inheritance: and Gad, and Reuben, and half the tribe of Manasseh, have received their inheritance beyond Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of the  Lord  gave them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sa Levitna ir ɓurawta visiya may jargi noŋɗi, kay ɗifinna vi Ma-Vatɗina kayni mi vocota visiya; jafna vi Gad hiɗi Ruben, hiɗi gal-jafna vi Manase, ir ɓurawta visiya, Musus sa ma sunda vi Ma-Vatɗina vulsitawa goy gal hena vi niy-lumna Yordan hay gal kuɗuwu.
Bulu: Ve Belévit ba ye bo te nyoñe ngap ézezañe jenan, amu ésaé betuni é ne ngabe jap, wôna Gad, Ruben a éfas ayoñ Manasé be nga nyoñe ngap e Yordan yat, mfaʼa jôp da tôô, ngabe Môze, mbo ésaé Nti, a nga ve be.
Guiziga: Amma kum masa wuɗkaka na, mizli levihey anta sa lumam mi nga taŋ a wuzla kumo ta ɓula. Asi mikuli taŋ masa gaka da Bumbulvuŋ na, mi nga taŋ i nah si. Ani Gat, Ruben waɗ reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, a lumam mi nga taŋ le si, a dubazaw Zurdeŋ, tisi pas ngi miprik naŋ. Muvula taŋ di i Moyis, gawla ngi Bumbulvuŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en keɓataa geɗal lesdi caka mooɗon, ngam kuugal limanku Jawmiraawo woni geɗal maɓɓe. Gada e Ruben e reeta lenyol Manassa njaɓi geɗe muuɗum'en gaɗa Urdun gal fuunaaŋge. Muusa, jaggiiɗo Jawmiraawo hokki ɓe ɗe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en keɓataa geɗal lesdi caka mooɗon, ngam kuugal limanku Jawmiraawo woni geɗal maɓɓe. Gada e Ruben e reeta lenyol Manassa njaɓi geɗe muuɗum'en gaɗa Urdun gal fuunaaŋge. Muusa, jaggiiɗo Jawmiraawo hokki ɓe ɗe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Levii, wa beka kpa kɔ-wa ŋma mɔ mgbara'nɛ́ na, wen tom-ɗafa GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Gad in Rubɛn sɛka reeta zuduk ko Manase, wa kpaa mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa nɛ war kur Jurdɛn ɓi si war daŋa-wese; nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa kaɗi.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Levii, wa beka kpa kɔ-wa ŋma mɔ mgbara'nɛ́ na, wen tom-ɗafa GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Gad in Rubɛn sɛka reeta zuduk ko Manase, wa kpaa mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa nɛ war kur Jurdɛn ɓi si war daŋa-wese; nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa kaɗi.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kanza ŋkwa shɛ kezha ka Lɛvi nyi hwa gheyɛ we, kwa nza ŋkɛ dzeghe Shala ya kaŋa nci bela ta ŋkwa. Ma Gad, Rəbɛn ba'a kwa bake ta bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ ne, nahe hɛ kekemave ŋa nci ŋkwa pelɛ kema ta hələa Zhəwrdɛŋe, laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci, Moyize, nde mene slene ta Mahwətə nde ndeke nda hɛ ke hɛ.»
Tupurri: Ane jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Lefin da' ge wo tway yoo äay ni gaè. Gahaçyla, ngeel sië jag mani Manwurn diñ tway äaara. Jar ni Gad wo, jar ni Ruben wo de nus jar ni Manasen hay da' wo ngeel ma äaaran we le go faale Jurdeçeç nen wur bo toñ, Moyis je peele Manwur hay haçn go ne hara.

Francais: Ces hommes s'étant levés se mirent en route, et Josué leur donna ses ordres à leur départ pour dresser l'état du pays, en disant: «Allez, parcourez le pays, décrivez-le et revenez auprès de moi; alors je jetterai pour vous le sort ici, devant Yahweh, à Silo.»
Anglais: And the men arose, and went away: and Joshua charged them that went to describe the land, saying, Go and walk through the land, and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the  Lord  in Shiloh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum nisin yaw kulo'o, nisi kala. Yosuwa vul hagata tam nisi sa kal li ɓurawta vi nagat ala: Tuɗgiya, ŋuygi nagata, ligi ɓurawta vi nagat goyo, bugolda nigi ma hotay tanu, bugol kayni nan ma li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta kigiya vok ir Ma-Vatɗina hay Silo.
Bulu: Nde bôte bete be nga kôlô si a ke. Yasua a nga bendé beveʼe si na: Kelan a bômane si, a veʼe je, éyoñe te mia ye bulan e be ma: ma ye bo asimba , asu denan asu be Nti e Silô.
Guiziga: Mizli muwunahay tuwa, a slikiɗam, a ram so. Mizli maram nga pura hirwuyo bleŋ bleŋ, naŋ kahana, naŋ kahana tuwa na, Zozuwe a ɓa taŋ ɗaˀ le: «A ram, bulaka hirwuyo bal bal, puraka bleŋ bleŋ, ɓa ki soko ti ɓi nah ng'avi ya, naŋ kahana kahana, i sa gukum ceregezleŋ a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ a Silo aka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Worɓe maajum ummi ngam ɓe ndilla. Yosuwa faamtini ɓe: “Ngaance nder lesdi fuu, mbinnde ndi, nden ngarte haa am. Min boo mi ƴaman muuyo Jawmiraawo bee waɗugo kur'u ngam mooɗon haa Silo ɗo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Worɓe maajum ummi ngam ɓe ndilla. Yosuwa faamtini ɓe: “Ngaance nder lesdi fuu, mbinnde ndi, nden ngarte haa am. Min boo mi ƴaman muuyo Jawmiraawo bee waɗugo kur'u ngam mooɗon haa Silo ɗo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ wa hoka ɗafa mɔ mɛ yak wen kpee naŋ nù. Josue ha̧a̧ nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yár tɛ nù‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ kpa'm, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ tani h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yí GASA WAN sɛn Silo hɛ̧ɛ̧.» Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i kur yak.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ wa hoka ɗafa mɔ mɛ yak wen kpee naŋ nù. Josue ha̧a̧ nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yár tɛ nù‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ kpa'm, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ tani h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yí GASA WAN sɛn Silo hɛ̧ɛ̧.» Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i kur yak.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape mbeli nyi kentave geva kezha newe hɛɗi slə. Ma nda teslə hɛ ne, ma ke Zhozəwɛ gezave nda ke hɛ: «Kwiɗi mə, newemte mə hɛɗi nda se yɛ kageze ɗa nza ta ŋkɛ. Katesla kwasheghediɗi 'ya kezha gheyɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə mbe Silo.»
Tupurri: Jar se maga aè hoo ra la kal wo hooge go ciñ. Josuwe hay wii ra we go gano: See wee, rañ wee sir no, car wee äil äe le go ni nday fer le da' ndi day ni ndi naa waçywaàale yañ go wee ti äe pel Manwur go Silo la.

Francais: Ces hommes partirent et, parcourant le pays, ils le décrivirent dans un livre selon les villes, en le partageant en sept portions; et ils revinrent auprès de Josué, dans le camp, à Silo.
Anglais: And the men went and passed through the land, and described it by cities into seven parts in a book, and came again to Joshua to the host at Shiloh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kayni kaliya, nisi ŋuy nagata, nisi ɗo naga na'ta gaa hay ɗerwella hiɗi ira' kaay goy siɗiya, kuɗ hoyok-ziyna hoyok-ziyna; bugolda nisi hotay kat Yosuwa hay kaŋŋa, hay Silo.
Bulu: Nalé bôte bete be nga ke, a mane tyiʼilane si ése: nde be nga mane veʼe je, tañe mengabe zamgbwa a mane tili me e ngume kalatʼété, avalʼane bitison bi né. Ane be nga bulane be Yasua e minkane Silô.
Guiziga: Mizli tuwa miram na, a ngiraka hirwuyo kããk. A tohoko ɓi ngi li mitaˀ taˀ tarnaˀa ti tuhu, vur walahaya tiɗeˀe gar, naŋ kahana kahana. A dirba nah, a mam ng'avu Zozuwe ar li pi sar taŋ a Silo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njehi, ɓe ngaanci nder lesdi fuu, ɓe mbinndi haa deftere no ɓe cenndiri ndi geɓe joweeɗiɗi, ɓe mbinndi inɗe berniiji maari fuu. Nden ɓe ngarti haa Yosuwa nder saŋngeere haa Silo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njehi, ɓe ngaanci nder lesdi fuu, ɓe mbinndi haa deftere no ɓe cenndiri ndi geɓe joweeɗiɗi, ɓe mbinndi inɗe berniiji maari fuu. Nden ɓe ngarti haa Yosuwa nder saŋngeere haa Silo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i yaka, wa yara tɛ nù‘i; wa yɔra mɔ nɛ wa zɔka tɛ o ye nɔ‘i tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba pii ɗoŋ ha̧ Josue sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari sɛn Silo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i yaka, wa yara tɛ nù‘i; wa yɔra mɔ nɛ wa zɔka tɛ o ye nɔ‘i tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba pii ɗoŋ ha̧ Josue sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari sɛn Silo.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape mbelia shɛhɛ, pa hɛ dzeghwamte hɛɗia shɛ. Pa hɛ rafeke nza ta sla ta hɛɗia shɛhɛ mberefaŋe ba'a sləa yɛ meleme ta nci kase sha Zhozəwɛ mbe ghedəkwəa Silo.
Tupurri: Jar sen la kal mbaara rawge rañ sirn so. Saara raw car äil sirn go ti' ti' renam, kee go de äi leegen wo day yer wo go äil kefdere. Saara kal ferge le da' Josuwe ti ngeel lagge ma Silo no.

Francais: Josué jeta pour eux le sort à Silo, en présence de Yahweh, et là Josué partagea le pays aux enfants d'Israël, selon leurs portions.
Anglais: And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the  Lord : and there Joshua divided the land unto the children of Israel according to their divisions.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta kisiya hay Silo vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, nam ɓuraw nagat goyo jar sa Israyella, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya.
Bulu: Nde Yasua a nga bo asimba asu dap, asu be Nti, a a nga kabe si e be meyoñ zamgbwa yʼIsraél me nga liʼi, avalʼane me mbe nkaban.
Guiziga: Zozuwe a ga taŋ ceregezleŋ a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ a Silo. Joˀ a wuɗuka hirwuyo da Israyeleye, ngi mburo ngi mburo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ton Yosuwa waɗani ɓe kur'u yeeso Jawmiraawo. Bana nii o yeɗiri le'i Isra'iila luttuɗi go lesdi muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ton Yosuwa waɗani ɓe kur'u yeeso Jawmiraawo. Bana nii o yeɗiri le'i Isra'iila luttuɗi go lesdi muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue pi̧i̧ tani ha̧ o be  Israɛl  sɛn Silo ti GASA WAN, kɛ̧ nɛ nù ha̧ wa dam nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue pi̧i̧ tani ha̧ o be  Israɛl  sɛn Silo ti GASA WAN, kɛ̧ nɛ nù ha̧ wa dam nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhozəwɛ slate kwasheghediɗi mbe Silo kwa kema ta Mahwətə, pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda hɛɗi ke ka Israyɛl kala nza ta yita ta nci.
Tupurri: Josuwe raw naa waçywaàale go ne hara ti äe pel Manwur go Silo ni. Se car sirn go ne jar Israyel wo, go de ngaäge ti äï¡ï¡ni wo ta' ta' äuy.

Francais: Le sort tomba sur la tribu des fils de Benjamin, selon ses familles, et le territoire qui leur échut par le sort, était entre les fils de Juda et les fils de Joseph.
Anglais: And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families: and the coast of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata vi jafna vi gurona vi Benyamin ɓuraway kayn kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya. Jaar nagata visiya ka jar gurona vi Yuda hiɗi gurona vi Yosef.
Bulu: Ngabe si bone be Bényamin é nga vebane be be, a asimba , avalʼane mebume map me né. Nné wop a mbe e zañe bone be Yuda a bone be Yôsep.
Guiziga: Taŋ migam ceregezleŋ na, ceregezleŋ a diɗ dumbuŋ ar sukwi ngi Benjameŋ. Hirwuy muvulaka taŋ di ti ceregezleŋ, naŋ ar wala ngi hirwuy ngi dideˀ ngi Zudahay ati ngi dideˀ ngi Zozefey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Aran kur'u waŋgini geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol. Ɓe keɓi geɗal lesdi hakkunde yimɓe Yahuuda e yimɓe Yusufu.
Fulfulde_DC: Aran kur'u waŋgini geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol. Ɓe keɓi geɗal lesdi hakkunde yimɓe Yahuuda e yimɓe Yusufu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Nù kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda in nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Nù kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda in nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋa hwelefe ta Bɛnjamɛn ntave geva laka kwasheghediɗi kala nza ta peləa nci. Ma ghala ta ŋa nci ŋkwa ne, kwelɛ ŋa yɛ Zhəwda le ŋa ŋwalea Zhozɛf.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale, se le' ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Benjamen no, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a. Tway ma äaaran hay ti holañ sir mani jar ni Judan wo de jar ni Josef wo.

Francais: Du côté du nord, leur frontière partait du Jourdain; et la frontière montait au nord sur le versant de Jéricho, puis montait dans la montagne à l'occident, et aboutissait au désert de Bethaven.
Anglais: And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Beth–aven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma gaana, jaara visi fokis hay Yordan pa, nam jik kat Yeriko hay gala' gaa'a, jik kulo hay hiɗiyta gal vulatiya kay co goy kat fulda vi Bet-Aven.
Bulu: Mfaʼa yʼakôé, nné ate a nga taté Yordan, a bet avele Yérikô akôé, a bete nkô, mfaʼa jôp da dim, a kele vam e nkôte si ba loone Bét-Avén.
Guiziga: Tir vay muŋ, maakway taŋ a zli zle a mi mizaw Zurdeŋ. A jiɗ kini ti ciki Zeriko, vay muŋ naŋ. Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, a jiɗ kini ngir ti muwã, waɗ ara kiɗ mi a Bet-Aveŋ misi a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa woyla, keerol maɓɓe fuɗɗi haa maayo Urdun. Ngol yehi hooseere haa woyla Yeriko, ngol tokki lesdi towndiije gal hiirnaaŋge, haa yotti ladde Baytawiina.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa woyla, keerol maɓɓe fuɗɗi haa maayo Urdun. Ngol yehi hooseere haa woyla Yeriko, ngol tokki lesdi towndiije gal hiirnaaŋge, haa yotti ladde Baytawiina.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ̀ Jurdɛn daŋ si ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ Jeriko daŋ nɛ mgbara kaya si war yee-wese, haɗi nɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà sɛn Bɛt-Avɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ̀ Jurdɛn daŋ si ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ Jeriko daŋ nɛ mgbara kaya si war yee-wese, haɗi nɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà sɛn Bɛt-Avɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Laka bela kwa gwela ne, slə mbe Zhəwrdɛŋe ghala shɛ kadzeme laka bela kwa gwela ta Zhɛriko, kadzeme mbe ghweme nya laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci hwa'a te ɓerama ta Bɛt-Avɛn.
Tupurri: Go äañ gloñhwede no kay mono, hagu äaara ur le jag Jurdeçeç ka' le' wo go ti jeñ Jeriko nen äañ gloñhwede äe no kay no. Se ur le ti huulin ka' le' wo go ti puuli ma Bet-Afen no.

Francais: De là, la frontière passait à Luz, sur le versant de Luz, au midi, c'est Béthel; puis la frontière descendait à Ataroth-Addar, par la montagne qui est au midi de Béthoron le Bas.
Anglais: And the border went over from thence toward Luz, to the side of Luz, which is Beth–el, southward; and the border descended to Ataroth–adar, near the hill that lieth on the south side of the nether Beth–horon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara jikis ɗawni hay Luz pa, jik kat Luz, ta ya' Betel hay gal kayami, nam jik hay Atarot-Addar, kulo kay hiɗiyna ma ka gal kayami vi Bet-Horon ta gaata.
Bulu: A beta lôte valé, a kui e Luz, avele Luz é ne Bétél e nké, a siliki Atarôt-Adar e nkôle yôp ô ne Bétôroñ e nké.
Guiziga: Maakway a cuh baɗ ti kẽh, ara bi a Luz, a ciki Luzo tir vay ruwuy naŋ. Luz vuna i Betel. Akẽh na, maakway a po sar nga Atrot-Adar, puɗak ar muwã misi a Bet-Horoŋ-Muzugudum, tir vay ruwuy naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol yehi haa wakeere hooseere Luus fombinaare–Luus e Baytila ɗum gootel. Keerol diirti haa Aterot-Addar dow hooseere haa fombina Baytihurun-les.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol yehi haa wakeere hooseere Luus fombinaare–Luus e Baytila ɗum gootel. Keerol diirti haa Aterot-Addar dow hooseere haa fombina Baytihurun-les.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn hi̧i̧  gbìsì  ɓira si Luz, ká̧ naŋ kaya Luz nɛ war ɗɔɔ, wen nɛ tɔ̧ Bɛtɛl.  Gbìsì  nɛɛ woyo si Atrɔt-Adar si zu kaya nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ká̧ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn hi̧i̧  gbìsì  ɓira si Luz, ká̧ naŋ kaya Luz nɛ war ɗɔɔ, wen nɛ tɔ̧ Bɛtɛl.  Gbìsì  nɛɛ woyo si Atrɔt-Adar si zu kaya nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ká̧ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Se tagha ne, kadzeyi nde laka Ləwz, kadzawa vare wəmbəa Ləwz nya heka mbeli kaBɛtɛl nya laka bela kwa zeme, kadzawa Atarot-Adar dzeme hwa ghweme nya laka bela kwa zeme yitea Bɛt-Horon nya kwake.
Tupurri: Hagun hee ni day le' wo go ti jeñ Lus maga diñ Betel go äañ waçybane. Se le' go Atarot-Adar, cegaë huuli maga go äañ waçyban Bet-Horon ma de hamge gesiñ wo go.

Francais: Et la frontière s'étendait et tournait, du côté de l'occident, vers le midi, depuis la montagne située en face de Béthoron au sud, et aboutissait à Cariath-Baal, qui est Cariath-Jéarim, ville des fils de Juda: voilà pour le côté de l'occident.
Anglais: And the border was drawn thence, and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that lieth before Beth–horon southward; and the goings out thereof were at Kirjath–baal, which is Kirjath–jearim, a city of the children of Judah: this was the west quarter.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma vulatina, jaara hot ŋuy kat niy-lum ma ŋolla gal kayami, fokay kat hiɗiyta ta ka ɗiger vok Bet-Horon hay gal kayami, co kat Kiryat-Baal, ta ya' ala Kiryat-Yeyarim, hoyok-ziyna vi gurona vi Yuda, kayni mi gal ma vulatina.
Bulu: Mfaʼa jôp da dim, nné a nga vit mfaʼa ya mañ e nké, ataté nkôl ô ne zôsôô a Bétôroñe nké, a ke vam e Kiryat-Bal, nye a ne Kiryat-Yearim, tisone bone be Yuda mfaʼa jôbe da dime le.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, a guno gunno tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, kini ngir ti vay ruwuy. A zlo zle a muwã misek duba cakay ati Bet-Horoŋ tir vay ruwuyo, ara kiɗ mi a Kiriyat-Baˀal, ada zilaka li nah vuna Kiriyat-Yeˀarim ma, i walahay ngi dideˀ ngi Zudahay. Yo hana i maakway ngi hirwuy taŋ vay si pas ngi pastaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol wayliti diga wakeere hooseere tiitotirnde bee Baytihurun hiirnaaŋgeere yahugo fombina haa yotti Kiriyat-Ba'al–kanjum woni Kiriyat-Ye'arim– berniwol nder maral yimɓe Yahuuda. Kanjum woni keerol hiirnaaŋgewol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol wayliti diga wakeere hooseere tiitotirnde bee Baytihurun hiirnaaŋgeere yahugo fombina haa yotti Kiriyat-Ba'al–kanjum woni Kiriyat-Ye'arim– berniwol nder maral yimɓe Yahuuda. Kanjum woni keerol hiirnaaŋgewol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira si ɗɔɔ ɓɛɛ zik si yee-wese nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ kaya nɛ duk ti Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ haɗi sɛn Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim gasa ye ko o bezaŋ Juda;  gbìsì  nɛ war yee-wese nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira si ɗɔɔ ɓɛɛ zik si yee-wese nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ kaya nɛ duk ti Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ haɗi sɛn Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim gasa ye ko o bezaŋ Juda;  gbìsì  nɛ war yee-wese nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci ta ghwemea shɛ ne, kazhɛre geva nde laka bela kwa zeme kezha ntsehe mbe Kiriyat-Ba'al nya heka mbeli kaKiriyat-Yɛyarim, meleme ta ŋwalea Zhəwda. Tsetse bela nya laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci.
Tupurri: Nen wur bo law mono, hagum kii go nen ti jeñ maarog ma kluu go nen äañ waçyban no kay. Se ur le ti huuli ma äañ waçyban Bet-Horon ka' le' go Kiryat-Baal maga diñ Kiryat-Yearim äi leege maga diñ ma jar ni Juda wo mono. Sen mo na diñ hagu äaara ma nen wur bo law no.

Francais: Pour le côté du midi, la frontière partait de l'extrémité de Cariath-Jéarim, et aboutissait à l'occident, elle aboutissait à la source des eaux de Nephtoa.
Anglais: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjath–jearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Galla ma kayamna fokay hay sin Kiryat-Yeyarim pa, jaara co gal vulatiya, nam co kat niy ma jaŋ hay Neftowana.
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya nké ô mbe ô tatéʼé akuʼu Kiryat-Yearim. Nné a mbe a kuik e jôbe da tôô, a kui fe anjeñ mendim me Néftôa.
Guiziga: Maakway taŋ vay ruwuyo a zli zle a Kiriyat-Yeˀarim. A muruɗ kini ngir ti Gasiŋ, yo ngir ti miyam miviɗiviɗi ngi Neftoˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa fombina, keerol fuɗɗi haa seɓatto Kiriyat-Ye'arim. Ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge haa yotti ceeɓooje Menefto'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa fombina, keerol fuɗɗi haa seɓatto Kiriyat-Ye'arim. Ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge haa yotti ceeɓooje Menefto'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Kiriat-Yearim, yak si war yee-wese si war zu-zer Nɛftoa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Kiriat-Yearim, yak si war yee-wese si war zu-zer Nɛftoa,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka bela kwa zeme ne, kagha geva nde te kwa keɗaŋe ta Kiriyat-Yɛyarim, kadzeyi nde laka Gasin ba'a kazhigə nde mɛa yɛ ɗaslea Nɛftowa.
Tupurri: Hagu ma nen äañ waçyban ur le jag Kiryat-Yearim ka' le' go nen wur bo law de ngar gedel ma Neftowan wo no.

Francais: Et la frontière descendait à l'extrémité de la montagne qui fait face à la vallée du fils d'Ennom, située dans la plaine des Rephaïm, au nord; puis elle descendait, par la vallée d'Ennom, vers le versant méridional des Jébuséens, elle descendait à la source de Rogel.
Anglais: And the border came down to the end of the mountain that lieth before the valley of the son of Hinnom, and which is in the valley of the giants on the north, and descended to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of Jebusi on the south, and descended to En–rogel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara jik goy hay sin hiɗiyta ta ka ɗiger vok lokŋa vi Ben-Hinnom, hay lokŋa vi sa Refayimna hay gal gaa'a. nam jik kat lokŋa vi Hinnom, kat sa Yebusiyena hay gal kayami, jik ta-ta hay Eyin-Rogel.
Bulu: Nné a nga siliki e susuʼa nkôl ô ne zôsôô a mbiʼili Bén-Inom, e mbiʼili Refayim akôé. A siliki mbiʼili Inom, avele Beyébuzieñ nké, a beta siliki a kui Eyin-Rogél,
Guiziga: A pi sar kini ngir tivi kiɗa mi ngi muwã misek duba cakay ati hurjijiŋ ngi Ben-Hinom, tir vay muŋ ngi li micay ngi mizli Refayay. A pi sar tir hurjijiŋ ngi Hinomo, aru kini ngir ti ciki hirwuy Zebusihey, vay ruwuy naŋ, waɗ a pi sar kini nga En-Rogel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden keerol diirti haa les hooseere tiitotirnde bee waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom, haa sera waadiwol Refayim woylaaha. Ngol diirti waadiwol Hinnom haa wakeere Yebusi'en fombinaare, yahugo En-Rogel.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden keerol diirti haa les hooseere tiitotirnde bee waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom, haa sera waadiwol Refayim woylaaha. Ngol diirti waadiwol Hinnom haa wakeere Yebusi'en fombinaare, yahugo En-Rogel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nɛ si ndɔŋ nú kaya nɛ duk ti gboŋgo Hinɔm nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ bɔkɔ-nù ko o be Refaim.  Gbìsì  baa gboŋgo Hinɔm si ɗɔɔ nɛ ká̧ kaya Jebus nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ si Ɛn-Rogɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nɛ si ndɔŋ nú kaya nɛ duk ti gboŋgo Hinɔm nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ bɔkɔ-nù ko o be Refaim.  Gbìsì  baa gboŋgo Hinɔm si ɗɔɔ nɛ ká̧ kaya Jebus nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ si Ɛn-Rogɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Slə tagha ne, kasawa nde yitea ghweme nya tiɗiɗi le zlərəa Bɛn-Hinom, laka zlərəa Refay nya laka bela kwa gwela. Kadzawa nde laka zlərəa Hinom, vare wəmbəa Zhɛbəs, laka bela kwa zeme, kadzawa nde hwa'a kwa Ɛn-Rogəwɛl.
Tupurri: Se le' go ti jag huuli ma de ngafge de log ma Bet-Hinom ga diñ log ma jar Refayim wo, go äañ gloñhwede mono. Hagun le' go ti jeñ huuli mani jar Yebusn wo, go äañ waçyban no kay no haçaç wo go En-Rogele.

Francais: Elle s'étendait au nord, et elle aboutissait à En-Sémès; elle aboutissait à Géliloth, qui est vis-à-vis de la montée d'Adommim, et elle descendait à la pierre de Boën, fils de Ruben.
Anglais: And was drawn from the north, and went forth to En–shemesh, and went forth toward Geliloth, which is over against the going up of Adummim, and descended to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hot ŋuy gal gaa'a, co kat Eyin-Semes, lo hay Gelilo, ta ka ɗiger vok ɗiŋiriŋŋa vi Adumim, bugolda nam jik kat hiɗiyta vi Bohan, goora vi Ruben.
Bulu: a lôt akôé a ke kui Eyin-Sémék, a kui fe e Gelilôt, nye a ne zôsôô a abete nkôle Adumin, a siliki akoʼo Bôañ, mona Ruben.
Guiziga: A mbiɗi kini tir vay muŋ, ara kiɗ mi a En-Semes ati Gelilot misek duba cakay ati li miɗingir ngi Adumim. A cuh baɗ ti kẽh, a pi sar tir ɗugur Bohaŋ. Bohaŋ na, i slimiɗ ngi mangal ngi Ruben.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngol wayliti gal woyla, ngol yehi haa En-Semes, nden haa Gelilot ko tiitotiri bee wa'orde Adumiima. Ngol diirti haa hayre Bohan–Bohan woni ɓii Ruben.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngol wayliti gal woyla, ngol yehi haa En-Semes, nden haa Gelilot ko tiitotiri bee wa'orde Adumiima. Ngol diirti haa hayre Bohan–Bohan woni ɓii Ruben.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira si ɗɔɔ woyo nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn haɗi sɛn Ɛn-Sɛmɛs in Gelilot nɛ duk tan nɛ yuwar daŋa-a si Adumim, ɓɛɛ zir sitɛ Ta ko Bohan bem ko Rubɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zira si ɗɔɔ woyo nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn haɗi sɛn Ɛn-Sɛmɛs in Gelilot nɛ duk tan nɛ yuwar daŋa-a si Adumim, ɓɛɛ zir sitɛ Ta ko Bohan bem ko Rubɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Kazhɛre geva nde laka bela kwa gwela ba'a kantsehe nde mbe Ɛn-Shɛmɛsh, zhɛne, mbe Gelilot nya tiɗiɗi le ŋkwa kedzeme laka Adəwmim, kasawa nde laka gela ta Bohan, wəzege ta Rəbɛn.
Tupurri: Se kii go äañ gloñhwede no kay le' wo go En-Semes wo de Gelilod maga kar de ngeel ma de mañge ciñ ma Adumin mono. Se le' wo go ti huuli mani Boham, je ni Ruben no.

Francais: Elle passait par le versant septentrional de la montagne en face de l'Arabah, et descendait à l'Arabah.
Anglais: And passed along toward the side over against Arabah northward, and went down unto Arabah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam jik hay gal ma gaana vi hiɗiyta ta ka vok fulda, bugolda jik hay fulda,
Bulu: A lôt avele nkôlʼakôé, zôsôô a Araba.
Guiziga: Yo a bi ti ciki li miɗingire, tir vay muŋ naŋ misek duba cakay ati Araba, a pi sar nga Araba.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol tokki woyla hooseere tiitotirnde bee waadiwol Urdun, ton ngol diirti.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol tokki woyla hooseere tiitotirnde bee waadiwol Urdun, ton ngol diirti.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tan nɛ ɗɔŋgɔ Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ zir woyo si nú Jurdɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tan nɛ ɗɔŋgɔ Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ zir woyo si nú Jurdɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛkwa ne, kadzeyi nde laka zlərəa Zhəwrdɛŋe, kadzawa nde laka bela kwa gwela hwa'a kwa zlərəa shɛ.
Tupurri: Hagun hee ti jeñ huuli ma de ngafge de fuul ma Araba go äañ gloñhwede no kay day le' go ti Araba no.

Francais: La frontière passait par le versant septentrional de Beth-Hagla, et la frontière aboutissait à la langue septentrionale de la mer Salée, vers l'embouchure du Jourdain, au midi: c'était la frontière du sud.
Anglais: And the border passed along to the side of Beth–hoglah northward: and the outgoings of the border were at the north bay of the salt sea at the south end of Jordan: this was the south coast.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugolda jaara jik hay gal ma gaana vi Bet-Hogla, kay co oy sin niy-lum ma mandana, hay gal ma gaana, hay vun niyn ma kus goyna vi Yordan gal kayami. Kayni mi jaara ma gal kayamna.
Bulu: A beta lôt avele Bét-Ogla akôé, a ke vam e mañ me nku akôé, mfaʼa ya asuane Yordan e nké: nné ya nké nye le.
Guiziga: Maakway a cuh baɗ ti ciki Bet-Hogla, misi tir vay muŋ, waɗ ara kiɗ mi ar li mici zoɗ ng'ar mubuliy mandaŋ mikiɗ mi ndok wãˀ, tir vay muŋ naŋ, ar li mizaw Zurdeŋ mira zlir ava. Maakway misi tir vay ruwuyo naŋ kahana so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden keerol tokki haa woyla hooseere Bayti-Hogila. Ngol haaɗi haa nastirde maayo Urdun nder Weendu Mannda, haa sera weendu man wakeere woyla. Kanjum woni keerol fombinaawol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden keerol tokki haa woyla hooseere Bayti-Hogila. Ngol haaɗi haa nastirde maayo Urdun nder Weendu Mannda, haa sera weendu man wakeere woyla. Kanjum woni keerol fombinaawol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Bɛt-Hogla nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ nɛnɛ nú gba-tɔp Tɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, fara nɛ Jurdɛn a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ sɛnɛ.  Gbìsì  nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Bɛt-Hogla nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ nɛnɛ nú gba-tɔp Tɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, fara nɛ Jurdɛn a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ sɛnɛ.  Gbìsì  nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kadzeyi nde laka bela kwa gwela ta Bɛt-Hogla, kazhigə laka mɛa ndərə kwa Ghwənəghwə, te ŋkwa nya jikə geva ŋkɛ le Zhəwrdɛŋe, laka bela kwa zeme.
Tupurri: Se ba ti jeñ huuli ma Bet-Hoglan go äañ gloñhwede no kay le' wo go ti waale maarog ma luglugn go äañ gloñhwede no kay de ngar ngeel maga Jurdeçeç kal le nen äe ni go äañ waçyban no kay mono. Sen mo na diñ hagu ma äañ waçyban no.

Francais: Le Jourdain formait sa limite du côté de l'orient. Tel fut l'héritage des fils de Benjamin, d'après ses frontières tout autour, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the coasts thereof round about, according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma kuɗuwna, Yordan ka hay jaara. Kayni ti vocota vi gurona vi Benyamin, kuɗ vuɗna vuɗna, hiɗi jaara visiya hay galam kafe.
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya jôp da tôô, Yordan nye a mbe nné. Ngabe si bone be Bényamin, avalʼane mebume map me né, a minné mié mimfaʼa mise, nye le.
Guiziga: Maakway vay si pas ngi miprike, i mizaw Zurdeŋ. Hana i hirwuy muvulaka da dideˀ ngi Benjameŋhey, vur muyo vur muyo, ti maakway naŋ misi tika tika gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Maayo Urdun woni keerol fuunaaŋgewol. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Maayo Urdun woni keerol fuunaaŋgewol. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ war daŋa-wese duka nɛ́ Jurdɛn. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa ká bá nɛ̀ mgbii-aa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  nɛ war daŋa-wese duka nɛ́ Jurdɛn. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa ká bá nɛ̀ mgbii-aa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci ne, Zhəwrdɛŋe ya kaghala. Tsetse ghala ta hɛɗi nya kaŋa ŋwalea Bɛnjamɛn, kala nza ta peləa nci.
Tupurri: Hagu ma nen wur bo toñn mañ le de Jurdeçeç tu. Mo so no diñ tway mani jar ma ti wer mani Benjamen wo, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a, go ti jag äe leñleñ äuy lay.

Francais: Les villes de la tribu des fils de Benjamin, selon leurs familles, étaient: Jéricho, Beth-Hagla, Emek-Casis,
Anglais: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Beth–hoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hoyok-ziyna vi gurona vi Benyamin kuɗ vuɗna visi kaf kayni: Yeriko, Bet-Hogla, Emek-Ketsis,
Bulu: Bitison bi bone be Bényamin, avalʼane mebume map me né mbie bi: Yérikô, Bét-Ogla, Emék-Késis;
Guiziga: Walahayay ngi sukwi ngi Benjameŋ, vur muyo vur muyo na, ani: Zeriko, Bet-Hogla, Emes-Kesis,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Berniiji lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol, ɗi'i: Yeriko e Bayti-Hogila e Emek-Kesis
Fulfulde_DC: Berniiji lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol, ɗi'i: Yeriko e Bayti-Hogila e Emek-Kesis
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasa ye ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ Jeriko, Bɛt-Hogla, Emɛk-Kesis,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasa ye ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ Jeriko, Bɛt-Hogla, Emɛk-Kesis,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi kaŋa ŋwalea Bɛnjamɛn kala nza ta peləa nci ne, Zhɛriko, Bɛt-Hogla, Ɛmɛk-Kɛsis,
Tupurri: Äi leege jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Benjamen de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta' hay wo diñ Jeriko, Bet-Hogla, Emek-Ketsis,

Francais: Beth-Araba, Samaraïm, Béthel,
Anglais: And Beth–arabah, and Zemaraim, and Beth–el,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bet-Araba, Semarayim, Betel,
Bulu: Bét-Araba, Semarayim, Bétél;
Guiziga: Bet-Araba, Semarayim, Betel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Bayti-Araba e Cemarayim e Baytila
Fulfulde_DC: e Bayti-Araba e Cemarayim e Baytila
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Araba, Semaraim, Bɛtɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Araba, Semaraim, Bɛtɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛt-Araba, Semarayim, Bɛtɛl,
Tupurri: Bet-Araba, Semarayim wo de Betel,

Francais: Avim, Aphara, Ophéra,
Anglais: And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Avim, Para, Ofra;
Bulu: Avim, Para, Ofra;
Guiziga: Avim, Para, Ofra,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Awwim e Para e Ofra
Fulfulde_DC: e Awwim e Para e Ofra
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abim, Para, Ofra,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abim, Para, Ofra,
Kapsiki_DC: Avim, Para, Ofra,
Tupurri: Afim, Para wo de Ofra,

Francais: Képhar-Emona, Ophni et Gabée: douze villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Chephar–ammoni, and Ophni, and Geba; twelve cities with their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kefar-Amonay, Ofni hiɗi Geba; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam ma' hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Kéfar-Amonayi, Ofni a Géba; bitison awôm a bibaé a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Kefar-Amona, Ofni waɗ Geba. Jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ nga cuw, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Kefar-Ammoonay e Ofni e Geba, ɗum berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Kefar-Ammoonay e Ofni e Geba, ɗum berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kefar-Amɔna, Ofni in Geba. Nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kefar-Amɔna, Ofni in Geba. Nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kefar-Amona, Hofni ba'a Gɛba. Meŋe bakeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ.
Tupurri: Kefar-Amonay, Ofni wo de Geba, tay äuy äi leege hwal ti äog de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Gabaon, Rama, Béroth,
Anglais: Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gabawon, Rama, Beerot;
Bulu: Gabaoñ, Rama, Beérôt;
Guiziga: Mekelemey ada ma, i: Gabaˀoŋ, Rama, Beˀerot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Gibiyon e Rama e Biirot
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Gibiyon e Rama e Biirot
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Gabaɔŋ, Rama, Bɛrot,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Gabaɔŋ, Rama, Bɛrot,
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ: Gabawon, Rama, Beyɛrot,
Tupurri: Ni pa diñ Gabawoñ, Rama wo de Beerod,

Francais: Mesphé, Caphara, Amosa,
Anglais: And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mispe, Kefira, Motsa;
Bulu: Mispé, Kefira, Môsa;
Guiziga: Mispe, Kefira, Mosa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Mispe e Kefiira e Mosa
Fulfulde_DC: e Mispe e Kefiira e Mosa
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mispɛ, Kefira, Mɔsa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mispɛ, Kefira, Mɔsa,
Kapsiki_DC: Mispɛ, Kefira, Mosa,
Tupurri: Mispe, Kefira wo de Mosa,

Francais: Récem, Jaréphel, Tharéla,
Anglais: And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Rekem, Yirpeel, Tareyalla;
Bulu: Rekém, Yirpeél, Tareala;
Guiziga: Rekem, Irpeˀel, Tarala,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Rekem e Yirpeyel e Tarala
Fulfulde_DC: e Rekem e Yirpeyel e Tarala
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Rekɛm, Yirpɛl, Tareala,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Rekɛm, Yirpɛl, Tareala,
Kapsiki_DC: Rɛkɛm, Irpɛyɛl, Tarala,
Tupurri: Rekem, Yirpel wo de Tareala,

Francais: Séla, Eleph, Jébus, qui est Jérusalem, Gabaath, et Cariath: quatorze villes et leurs villages.  Tel fut l'héritage des fils de Benjamin selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, which is Jerusalem, Gibeah, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sela, Helef, Yebus ta ya' Yerusalemta, Gilbeyat hiɗi Kiryat; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam fiɗi hiɗi ma gurayn lay. Kayni ti vocota vi gurona vi Benyamin kuɗ vuɗna visiya.
Bulu: Séla, Eléf, Yebus, nye a ne Yérusalém, Gibeat a Kiryat: bitison awôm a binyin a minlame miap. Ngabe si bone be Bényamin, avalʼane mebume map me né, nje le.
Guiziga: Sela, Elef, walahay ngi Zebusihey, mbiɗeˀvra, Zeruzalem, Gibeya waɗ Kiriyat. Jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ nga mufaɗa, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma. Hana i hirwuy muvulaka da dideˀ ngi Benjameŋhey vur muyo vur muyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ceela e Elef e Yebusi – kanjum woni Urusaliima – e Gibiya e Kiriyat, ɗum berniiji sappo e nayi bee gure maaji. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ceela e Elef e Yebusi – kanjum woni Urusaliima – e Gibiya e Kiriyat, ɗum berniiji sappo e nayi bee gure maaji. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Benyamin bee geɓe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sela, Elɛf ye ko o be Jebus nɛ‘i sa'e Jerusalɛm, in Gibea-Kiriat: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sela, Elɛf ye ko o be Jebus nɛ‘i sa'e Jerusalɛm, in Gibea-Kiriat: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Sɛla, Ɛlɛf, meleme ta ka Zhɛbəs, geze ta ŋkɛ, Zhɛrəzalɛm, Gibɛya ba'a Kiriyat. Meŋe wəfaɗeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ. Nya ya kaghala ta hɛɗia ŋwalea Bɛnjamɛn kala peləa nci.
Tupurri: Sela, Elef wo de Yebus maga diñ Jerusalem mono, Gebeyad wo de Kiryad. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti naa de sir ma ti äaaran wo. Mo so no diñ tway mani jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Benjamen wo, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: La seconde part échut par le sort à Siméon, à la tribu des fils de Siméon, selon leurs familles: leur héritage fut au milieu de l'héritage des fils de Juda.
Anglais: And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families: and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta ta sem ma'ta vul galla mi jafna vi gurona vi Simeyon, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya. Vocota visiya ka jar vocota vi gurona vi Yuda.
Bulu: Ngabe si baa é nga kôlô é mbe nyô Siméoñ, bone be Siméoñ, avalʼane mebume map me né. Ngabe jap é mbe ézezañe ngabe bone be Yuda.
Guiziga: Taŋ migaka ceregezleŋ sar mucuw naŋ na, a diɗ ar sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ. A vulaka taŋ hirwuyo vur muyo vur muyo. Hirwuy ngi sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ, naŋ a wuzla hirwuy ngi dideˀ ngi Zudahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u ɗiɗaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Simeyon bee geɓe maagol. Ɓe keɓi geɗal maɓɓe haa nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u ɗiɗaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Simeyon bee geɓe maagol. Ɓe keɓi geɗal maɓɓe haa nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yiitoo nù nɛ tani baa duka nɛ ko Simɛɔŋ, ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yiitoo nù nɛ tani baa duka nɛ ko Simɛɔŋ, ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa bake ta hɛɗi nya kentave geva laka kwasheghediɗi ne, nahe ŋkɛ kendeke nda geva ke yita ta Simɛyon kala nza ta peləa nci. Ma ŋa nci wəsə kezeme ghɛ ne, kwelɛ tepe ta ŋa ŋwalea Zhəwda.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ma de äogn se le' ti moobe mani Simeyoñ no, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a. AÈ caa tway ne hara äil tway mani jar ni Judan wo.

Francais: Ils eurent dans leur héritage: Bersabée, Sabée, Molada,
Anglais: And they had in their inheritance Beer–sheba, or Sheba, and Moladah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata ta nisi fa' vocota kayni: Beer-Seba, Seba, Molada;
Bulu: Ngap be nga nyoñ nje nyô: Birséba, Séba, Môlada;
Guiziga: Hirwuy muvulaka taŋ di i: walahay Berseba, Seba, Molada,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko laatani ɓe: Biirsaba e Sema e Molada
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko laatani ɓe: Biirsaba e Sema e Molada
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ wa kpaa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi nɛ́ Bɛrseba, Seba, Mɔlada,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ wa kpaa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi nɛ́ Bɛrseba, Seba, Mɔlada,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi kemave hɛ kawəsə kezeme ghɛ ne, Bɛrshɛba, Shɛba, Molada,
Tupurri: Äi leege maga wo äil tway äaaran wo de Beer-Seba, Seba, Molada

Francais: Haser-Sual, Bala, Asem,
Anglais: And Hazar–shual, and Balah, and Ezem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hatsar-Suwal, Bala, Atsem;
Bulu: Asar-Sual, Bala, Atsém;
Guiziga: Hasar-Suwal, Baˀala, Esem,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hacar-Su'al e Baala e Ecem
Fulfulde_DC: e Hacar-Su'al e Baala e Ecem
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hasar-Sual, Bala, Esɛm,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hasar-Sual, Bala, Esɛm,
Kapsiki_DC: Hasar-Shəwal, Ba'ala, Ɛsɛm,
Tupurri: Hatsar-Suwal, Bala wo de Atsem,

Francais: Eltholad, Béthul, Harma,
Anglais: And Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: El-Tolad, Betul, Horma;
Bulu: Eltôlad-Betul, Orma;
Guiziga: Eltolat, Betul, Horma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eltolat e Betula e Horma
Fulfulde_DC: e Eltolat e Betula e Horma
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛltolad, Betul, Ɔrma,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛltolad, Betul, Ɔrma,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛltolad, Betəwl, Horma,
Tupurri: Eltolad, Betul wo de Horam,

Francais: Siceleg, Beth-Marchaboth, Hasersusa,
Anglais: And Ziklag, and Beth–marcaboth, and Hazar–susah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Siklag, Bet-Markabot, Hatsar-Susa;
Bulu: Tiklag, Bét-Marka bôt, Asar-Susa;
Guiziga: Siklak, Bet-Markabot, Hasar-Susa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Cikilak e Bayti-Markabot e Hacar-Susa
Fulfulde_DC: e Cikilak e Bayti-Markabot e Hacar-Susa
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Siklag, Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Siklag, Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susa,
Kapsiki_DC: Siklag, Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Səwsa,
Tupurri: Siglag, Bet-Markabod wo de Hatsar-Susa.

Francais: Beth-lebaoth et Sarohen: treize villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Beth–lebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities and their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bet-Lebawot hiɗi Saruhen, hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona doogo yam ɦidi hiɗi hoyok-ziyn ma gurayna;
Bulu: Bét-Lebaôt a Saruéñ: bitison awôm a bilaa a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Bet-Lebaˀot waɗ Saruwen. Jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kuruˀ nga makir, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Bayti-Lebayot e Sarukeena, ɗum berniiji sappo e tati bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Bayti-Lebayot e Sarukeena, ɗum berniiji sappo e tati bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Lebaot in Saruhɛn: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-taar in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Lebaot in Saruhɛn: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-taar in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛt-Lebawot ba'a Sharəwɛn: meŋe mahekeneghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama ba'a nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ.
Tupurri: Bet-Lebaod wo de Saruhen. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti swa' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Aïn, Remmon, Athar et Asan, quatre villes et leurs villages;
Anglais: Ain, Rimmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ayin, Rimmon, Eter hiɗi Asan, hoyok-ziyn ŋulon fiɗi hiɗi hoyok-ziyn guray ma kuɗumna;
Bulu: Ayin, Rimôn, Eter a Akan: bitison binyin a minlame miap,
Guiziga: Mekelemey ada ma, i: Ayin, Rimoŋ, Eter waɗ Asaŋ. Jom gar na, walahay mufaɗa, jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Ayin e Rimmon e Eter e Asan, ɗum berniiji nayi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Ayin e Rimmon e Eter e Asan, ɗum berniiji nayi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ain, Rimɔŋ, Etɛr in Asaŋ: nɛ́ gasa ye naar in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka Ain, Rimɔŋ, Etɛr in Asaŋ: nɛ́ gasa ye naar in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ya shɛ: Ayin, Rimon, Ɛtɛr ba'a Ashan, wəfaɗe meleme nyi jama jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Ni pa diñ Ayin, Rimon, Eter wo de Asan, äi leege naa de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: ainsi que tous les villages aux environs de ces villes, jusqu'à Baalath-Béer, qui est la Ramath du midi. -- Tel fut l'héritage de la tribu des fils de Siméon selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And all the villages that were round about these cities to Baalath–beer, Ramath of the south. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi ziy gurayna ma ka goboy hiɗi hoyok-ziy namna kafe, ta-ta hay Baalat-Beer ta ya' Ramat hay gal ma kayamna, kayni ti vocota vi jafna vi gurona vi Simeyon, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya.
Bulu: a minlam mise mi mbe mefôla ya bitison bite, a kui Baalat-Bir, nye a ne Ramat ya nké. Ngabe si bone be Siméoñ, avalʼane mebume map me né, nje le.
Guiziga: waɗ prokoy mugun gun hirnga ngi walahay tayna gar, hã sesẽŋ a Baˀalat-Beyer ati Rama ngir vay ruwuy. Hirwuy muvulaka da dideˀ ngi Simeyoŋhoy, vur muyo vur muyo na i hana so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mari gure taariiɗe berniiji ɗi'i fuu haa yotti Ba'alat-Biir – kanjum woni Rama-fombina. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Simeyon bee geɓe maagol .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mari gure taariiɗe berniiji ɗi'i fuu haa yotti Ba'alat-Biir – kanjum woni Rama-fombina. Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Simeyon bee geɓe maagol .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wi tɛ kai o be geɗek ye nɛ ya ká̧ o gasa-a nɔ‘i hɔ sɛn Balat-Bɛr nɛ‘i sa'e Ramat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ a zu-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wi tɛ kai o be geɗek ye nɛ ya ká̧ o gasa-a nɔ‘i hɔ sɛn Balat-Bɛr nɛ‘i sa'e Ramat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ a zu-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ya dzeyi yitea melemea shɛhɛ hwa'a mbe Ba'alat-Bɛr nya kaRamat, laka bela kwa zeme. Tsetse ŋa hwelefe ta ŋwalea Simɛyon kala nza ta peləa nci.
Tupurri: Äi leege sen wo äuy wo de progre ma ti äaaran wo äuy haçaç le' wo go Baalat-Beer maga diñ Ramad ma äañ waçyban mono. Mo so no diñ tway mani jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Simeyoñ wo mono.

Francais: L'héritage des fils de Siméon fut pris sur la portion des fils de Juda; car la portion des fils de Juda était trop grande pour eux, et c'est au milieu de leur territoire que les fils de Siméon reçurent leur héritage.
Anglais: Out of the portion of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon: for the part of the children of Judah was too much for them: therefore the children of Simeon had their inheritance within the inheritance of them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagata vi gurona vi Simeyon nisi yawa' kuɗ nagata vi gurona vi Yuda; kay galla vi gurona vi Yuda nam ŋol kisiya, kuɗ na'ta gurona vi Simeyon fi galla visi kayn jar nagata visiya.
Bulu: Ngabe si bone be Siméoñ é nga nyoñeban afôla si bone be Yuda, amu ngabe bone be Yuda é nga dañ anen mfaʼa wop, ajô te bone be Siméoñ be nga nyoñe ngap ézezañe jap.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Simeyoŋhoyo hirwuy taŋ, a slaka taŋ di avu hirwuy ngi dideˀ ngi Zudahay. Asi mike na, hirwuy ngi sukwi ngi Zuda a didila taŋ le. Sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ a lum hirwuyo mi nga naŋ a wuzla ngi Zudahay na vurˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndoni geɗal yimɓe Simeyon nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda. Geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda ɗuuɗino, ɓuri haaje maɓɓe. Ngam maajum yimɓe Simeyon keɓi geɗal muuɗum'en haa nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndoni geɗal yimɓe Simeyon nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda. Geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda ɗuuɗino, ɓuri haaje maɓɓe. Ngam maajum yimɓe Simeyon keɓi geɗal muuɗum'en haa nder geɗal yimɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ tɛ ko o bezaŋ Juda wen nɛ̀ war ko o bezaŋ Juda duka nɛ gasa-a nyɛmna wen wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o bem ko Simɛɔŋ kpaa nɛ war mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘i tɛ nù ko o bem ko Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ tɛ ko o bezaŋ Juda wen nɛ̀ war ko o bezaŋ Juda duka nɛ gasa-a nyɛmna wen wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o bem ko Simɛɔŋ kpaa nɛ war mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘i tɛ nù ko o bem ko Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋa ŋwalea Simɛyon wəsə kezeme ghɛ ne, mbe ŋa ŋwalea Zhəwda kelete mbeli, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe hɛ kekemave bela kwele ma ke hɛ, vatse nza hwelefe ta Simɛyon te tepe ta hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: AÈ caa tway ne hara äil tway mani jar ni Judan wo werga tway äaara hay raw kluu debañ. AÈ caa ne jar ni Simeyoñ wo see tway mani äaara no.

Francais: La troisième part échut par le sort aux fils de Zabulon selon leurs familles; la frontière de leur héritage s'étendait jusqu'à Sarid.
Anglais: And the third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families: and the border of their inheritance was unto Sarid:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta ta sem ɦidita vul galla mi gurona vi Zabulon kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya. Vun-nagata visiya kal ta-ta hay Sarid.
Bulu: Ngabe lale é mbe nyô bone be Zabuloñ, avalʼane mebume map me né. Nnéa si wop a mbe ndam a kui Sarid.
Guiziga: Ceregezleŋ mimakir naŋ a diɗ ar sukwi ngi Zabuloŋ. A vulaka taŋ hirwuyo vur muyo vur muyo. Maakway ngi hirwuy taŋ a ndih zle ar vay ruwuyo hã sesẽŋ a Sarit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u tataɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Zabulon bee geɓe maagol. Keerol geɗal maɓɓe yotti Sariida.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u tataɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Zabulon bee geɓe maagol. Keerol geɗal maɓɓe yotti Sariida.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tani baa taar nù ha̧ o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.  Gbìsì  kɔ-wa hɔɔ si Sarid.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tani baa taar nù ha̧ o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.  Gbìsì  kɔ-wa hɔɔ si Sarid.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa maheke ta ŋkwa nya kentave geva le sla kwasheghediɗi ne, ŋa ŋwalea Zabəlon kala nza ta peləa nci. Ma hɛɗia nci ne, kadzawa laka bela kwa zeme hwa'a kwa Sarid.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ma de swa'n se le' ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Sabuloñ no, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a. Hagu tway äaaran hee go Sarid haçaç.

Francais: Leur frontière montait vers l'occident, vers Mérala, touchait à Debbaseth, touchait au torrent qui coule devant Jéconam.
Anglais: And their border went up toward the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that is before Jokneam;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara visi jik hay gal ma vulatina, hiɗi gal Mareyala, jik kat Dabeket, bugolda kat niy ma ka riŋ goy vok Yokneyam.
Bulu: A beté mfaʼa jôp da dim a mfaʼa ya Maréala, a ke nnambe Dabékét a ôtôñ wo lôt ôsu Yôkneam.
Guiziga: Maakway a zuɓ baɗ akẽh, aru kini ng'asi pas ngi pastaˀa, hã sesẽŋ a Marala, meh meh avu Dabeset waɗ mizaw misek duba cakay ati Yokneˀam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge haa yotti Marhala, ngol meemi Dabbeseet, ngol yotti maayel tiitotirŋgel bee Yokne'am.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ngol yehi hiirnaaŋge haa yotti Marhala, ngol meemi Dabbeseet, ngol yotti maayel tiitotirŋgel bee Yokne'am.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa daŋa si yee-wese si war Marala tan nɛ̀ Pabɛsɛt in be-zer nɛ duk mgbák ti Yoknɛam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa daŋa si yee-wese si war Marala tan nɛ̀ Pabɛsɛt in be-zer nɛ duk mgbák ti Yoknɛam.
Kapsiki_DC: Slə tagha ne, kadzeme ghala shɛ laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci hwa'a mbe Marala, zhɛne, hwa'a mbe Dabɛshɛt ba'a mɛa hələ nya kehwɛ dzeyi laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea Yoknɛyam.
Tupurri: Se hee go nen wur bolaw no kay le' go nen Mereala, wo du' Dabesed haçaç wo go ti pyew ma ti jeñ Yokneyam no.

Francais: De Sarid, elle revenait à l'orient, vers le soleil levant, jusqu'à la frontière de Céseleth-Thabor, aboutissait vers Dabereth et montait à Japhiré.
Anglais: And turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrising unto the border of Chisloth–tabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Sarid pa nam jik hay gal kuɗuwu, hay galla vi fatta ma dayna, hay jaara vi Kisilot-Tabor, co kat Dabrat, cap jik hay Yafiya.
Bulu: A kôlô Sarid a kôñelan mfaʼa jôp da tôô, e nné Kislôt-Tabor, a ke vame Dabrat, éyoñe te a bet e Yafia.
Guiziga: Ti Sarite, maakway a gun kini ng'asi pas ngi mipriki, meh meh avu hirwuy Kisilot-Tabor, a muruɗ kini nga Dabrat, waɗ a zuɓ paɗ hã sesẽŋ a Yafiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa wakeere feere ngol fuɗɗi haa Sariida, ngol yehi fuunaaŋge haa keerol Kislot-Taboora, nden ngol yehi haa Daberat, ngol wa'i heedi Yafiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa wakeere feere ngol fuɗɗi haa Sariida, ngol yehi fuunaaŋge haa keerol Kislot-Taboora, nden ngol yehi haa Daberat, ngol wa'i heedi Yafiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  duka Sarid zik nɛnɛ si war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ  gbìsì  ko Kislɔt-Tabɔr, yak si Dabɛrat, ɓɛɛ daŋ hɔ Yafia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  duka Sarid zik nɛnɛ si war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ  gbìsì  ko Kislɔt-Tabɔr, yak si Dabɛrat, ɓɛɛ daŋ hɔ Yafia.
Kapsiki_DC: Se mbe Sarid ne, kazhɛre geva nde laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci hwa'a kwa ghala ta Kislot-Tabor, kajive laka Dabrat ba'a kadzeme laka Yafiya.
Tupurri: Se ur le Sarid ka'a, kii go nen wer nen wur botoñ no kay wo go ti hagu de Kislot-Tabor, nduu wo go Dabrad day kal wo go Yafiya.

Francais: De là, elle passait, vers l'orient, vers le soleil levant à Geth-Hépher, à Thacasin, et aboutissait à Remmon, qui confine à Noa.
Anglais: And from thence passeth on along on the east to Gath–hepher, to Eth–kazin, and goeth out to Rimmon–methoar to Neah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɗawayn pa, nam jik gal kuɗuwu hay Gita-Hefer, hay Itta-Katsin, co kat Rimmon, ŋuy ta-ta hay Neya.
Bulu: A kôlô valé a ke lôt e jôp da tôô, zôsôô a Gita-Efer, a Ita-Kisin, a ke vame Rimôn, a kui Néa.
Guiziga: Baɗ ti kẽh ma na, aru kini ng'asi pas ngi mipriki, hã sesẽŋ a Gat-Hefer, a Et-Kasiŋ, ara bi a Rimoŋ, waɗ a guno nga Neya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngol tokki yahugo fuunaaŋge haa yotti Gat-Hefer e Et-Kasiina, ngol wayliti heedi Ne'a haa laawol Rimmona.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngol tokki yahugo fuunaaŋge haa yotti Gat-Hefer e Et-Kasiina, ngol wayliti heedi Ne'a haa laawol Rimmona.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ  gbìsì  duka hi̧i̧ yak nɛnɛ siti si war daŋa-wese, si Gat-Hefɛr in si Ita-Kasin gbo si war Rimɔŋ, ɓɛɛ zir si war Nɛa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ  gbìsì  duka hi̧i̧ yak nɛnɛ siti si war daŋa-wese, si Gat-Hefɛr in si Ita-Kasin gbo si war Rimɔŋ, ɓɛɛ zir si war Nɛa.
Kapsiki_DC: Se tagha ne, kadzeme nde laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci hwa'a mbe Gat-Hɛfɛr ba'a Ita-Kasin, kadzeyi nde laka Rimon ba'a kazhɛre geva nde laka Nɛya.
Tupurri: Se ur le ni ka' le' go nen wur botoñ nen Gita-Hefer wo de Ita-Katsin, le' go Rimon day kii go Neya.

Francais: La frontière tournait du côté du nord vers Hanathon, et aboutissait à la vallée de Jephtahel.
Anglais: And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon: and the outgoings thereof are in the valley of Iphtah–el:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda, jaara ŋuy hay gal gaa'a vi Hanaton, co goy kat ɦoora vi Yifta-El.
Bulu: Eyoñe te a kôñelan Anatôn akôé, a ke vame mone mbiʼili Yifta-El.
Guiziga: Kini tir vay muŋ na, maakway a guno Hanatoŋ, waɗ ara kiɗ mi ar hurjijiŋ ngi Ifta-El.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ton ngol wayliti, ngol yehi woyla haa Hannaton. Ngol haaɗi nder waadiwol Yiftah-El.
Fulfulde_DC: Ton ngol wayliti, ngol yehi woyla haa Hannaton. Ngol haaɗi nder waadiwol Yiftah-El.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ  gbisi  zik woyo nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn si war Hanalɔŋ tik nɛnɛ kɔ̧ gboŋgo Yifta-Ɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ  gbisi  zik woyo nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn si war Hanalɔŋ tik nɛnɛ kɔ̧ gboŋgo Yifta-Ɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Kazhɛre geva ŋkɛ laka bela kwa gwela ta Hanaton ba'a kazhigə kwa zlərəa Ifta-Ɛl.
Tupurri: Hagun fer go nen äañ gloñhwede Hanatone, day le' go ti log ma Yifta-El no.

Francais: Les villes étaient: Catheth, Naalol, Séméron, Jedala et Bethléhem: douze villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And Kattath, and Nahalal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Beth–lehem: twelve cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Kattah, Nahalal, Simron, Yideyala, Betlehem; hoyok-ziy ŋulon doogo yam ma' hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Be nga bili fe Kata, Naala, Simrôn, Yideala; Bétléhém: bitison awôm a bibaé a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Hirwuyo walahay madiɗahay anga kuruˀ nga cuw, waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma. I walahay Katat, Nahalal, Simroŋ, Idala waɗ Betelyem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo Kattat e Nahalal e Simron e Yidala e Baytilaama, hawti berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo Kattat e Nahalal e Simron e Yidala e Baytilaama, hawti berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye nɛ duka tɛ nu kɔ-wa nɛ́ Katat, Nahatal, Simrɔŋ, Yideala in Bɛtlɛhɛm: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye nɛ duka tɛ nu kɔ-wa nɛ́ Katat, Nahatal, Simrɔŋ, Yideala in Bɛtlɛhɛm: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hɛɗia shɛ ne, meleme meŋe bakeghəmbe ya te: Katat, Nahalal, Shimron, Idala, Bɛtelɛhɛm le meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege äaaran hay wo ni pa diñ Katad, Nahalal, Simron, Yideala wo de Betlehem. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti äog de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Tel fut l'héritage des fils de Zabulon, selon leurs familles: ces villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti vocota vi gurona vi Zabulon, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya, hoyok-ziy ma ŋulo namna lakŋi hiɗi ma gurayna.
Bulu: Ngabe si bone be Zabuloñ be nga nyoñ nje le, avalʼane mebume map me né; bitison bite a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Hana i hirwuy muvulaka da sukwi ngi Zabuloŋ, vur muyo vur muyo. I walahay tayna waɗ prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Zabulon bee geɓe maagol, berniiji ɗi'i bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Zabulon bee geɓe maagol, berniiji ɗi'i bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse ŋa ŋwalea Zabəlon hɛɗi kezeme ghɛ kala nza ta peləa nci, meleme nyi jama jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege sen wo de sir ma ti äaaran wo mo äuy na diñ tway mani jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Sabuloñ wo, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: La quatrième part échut par le sort à Issachar, aux fils d'Issachar, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And the fourth lot came out to Issachar, for the children of Issachar according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta ta sem fiɗita vul galla mi Isakar, mi gurona vi Isakar, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya.
Bulu: Ngabe nyini é nga kôlô é mbe nyô Isakar, asu bone bʼIsakar, avalʼane mebume map me né.
Guiziga: Ceregezleŋ mumufaɗ naŋ a diɗ ar sukwi ngi Isakar. A vulaka taŋ hirwuyo vur muyo vur muyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u nayaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Issakar bee geɓe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u nayaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Issakar bee geɓe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War naar-a, tani baa nù ko Isakar ha̧ o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War naar-a, tani baa nù ko Isakar ha̧ o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa wəfaɗe ta ŋkwa nya kelete mbelia Isakar laka kwasheghediɗi ne, ŋa peləa nyi kwa yita ta Isakar.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ma de naan se le' ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Isakar no, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: Leur frontière était Jezraël, Casaloth, Sunem,
Anglais: And their border was toward Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jaara visiya co kat Yisreel, Kesulot, Sunem,
Bulu: Nné wop a nga kui Yizrél, Yesulôt, Sunem,
Guiziga: Maakway ngi hirwuy taŋ a bi kini ngir ti Zisreyel, Kesulot, Sunem,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa berniiji gonɗi nder maagal: Yisre'el e Kesulot e Sunem
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa berniiji gonɗi nder maagal: Yisre'el e Kesulot e Sunem
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Pɛsa nù kɔ-wa hɔɔ Yizreɛl, Kezulot, Sunɛm,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Pɛsa nù kɔ-wa hɔɔ Yizreɛl, Kezulot, Sunɛm,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ghala ta hɛɗia nci ne, dzeyi laka Zhizrɛyɛl, Kɛsəwlot, Shəwnɛm,
Tupurri: Hagu äaaran caa le äil diñ Jisreyel, Kesulod, Sunem,

Francais: Hapharaïm, Séon, Anaharath,
Anglais: And Hapharaim, and Shion, and Anaharath,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Harafayim, Siyon, Anaharat;
Bulu: Afarayim, Kiôn, Anaarat;
Guiziga: Hafarayim, Siyoŋ, Anaharat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hafarayim e Siiyon e Anakarat
Fulfulde_DC: e Hafarayim e Siiyon e Anakarat
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hafarayim,  Siɔŋ , Anahara,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hafarayim,  Siɔŋ , Anahara,
Kapsiki_DC: Hafarayim, Siyon, Anaharat,
Tupurri: Hafarayim, Siyon wo de Anaharad,

Francais: Rabboth, Césion, Abès,
Anglais: And Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Rabbit, Kisiyon, Abes;
Bulu: Rabit, Kisiôn, Abet;
Guiziga: Rabit, Kisiyoŋ, Ebes,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e nokkuure wi'eteende Rabbit e Kisiyon e Ebes
Fulfulde_DC: e nokkuure wi'eteende Rabbit e Kisiyon e Ebes
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Rabit, Kisiɔŋ, Ebɛs,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Rabit, Kisiɔŋ, Ebɛs,
Kapsiki_DC: Rabit, Kishiyon, Ɛbɛs,
Tupurri: Rabid, Kisyon wo de Abes,

Francais: Ramèth, En-Gannim, En-Hadda et Beth-Phésès.
Anglais: And Remeth, and En–gannim, and En–haddah, and Beth–pazez;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Remet, Eyin-Ganim, Eyin-Hadda hiɗi Bet-Patses;
Bulu: Rémét, Eyin-Kanim, Eyin-Ada a Bét-Patét;
Guiziga: Remet, En-Ganim, En-Hada waɗ Bet-Pases.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Remet e En-Gannim e En-Hadda e Bayti-Pacces.
Fulfulde_DC: e Remet e En-Gannim e En-Hadda e Bayti-Pacces.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Remɛt, Ɛn-Ganim, Ɛn-Hada in Bɛt-Pasɛs.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Remɛt, Ɛn-Ganim, Ɛn-Hada in Bɛt-Pasɛs.
Kapsiki_DC: Rɛmɛt, Ɛn-Ganim, Ɛn-Hada ba'a Bɛt-Pasɛs.
Tupurri: Remed, En-Ganim, En-Hada wo de Bet-Patses.

Francais: La frontière touchait à Thabor, à Séhésima et à Beth-Samès, et aboutissait au Jourdain: seize villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: And the coast reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Beth–shemesh; and the outgoings of their border were at Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam co kat Tabor, kat Sahatsima, tam Bet-Semes, dab goy kat Yordan; hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona doogo yam karkiya hiɗi hoyok-ziy guray ma kuɗumna.
Bulu: Nné ate a nga nnambe fe Tabor a Kaasima, a Bétsemék, a ke vame Yordan: bitison awôm a bisaman a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Maakway aru meh meh avu Tabor, Kasayim, Bet-Semes waɗ ara kiɗ mi a mi mizaw Zurdeŋ. Jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay anga kuruˀ nga merkeɗe, jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Keerol maɓɓe meemi boo Taboora e Sakasuuma e Bayti-Semes, ngol haaɗi haa maayo Urdun, ɗum berniiji sappo e joweego bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Keerol maɓɓe meemi boo Taboora e Sakasuuma e Bayti-Semes, ngol haaɗi haa maayo Urdun, ɗum berniiji sappo e joweego bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa hɔɔ Tabɔr, Sahasima in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, tik nɛnɛ Jurdɛn: nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  kɔ-wa hɔɔ Tabɔr, Sahasima in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, tik nɛnɛ Jurdɛn: nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kakwaɗe Tabor, Shasayim nde, kantsehe nde hwa'a kwa Zhəwrdɛŋe. Meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe meleme nyi jama jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Hagun hee Tahor, hee Sahatsima, hee Bet-Semes day wo go kañ ti ne Jurdeçeç. Tay äuy äi leege hwal ti hiira' de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: Tel fut l'héritage de la tribu des fils d'Issachar, selon leurs familles: les villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti vocota vi jafna vi Isakar, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya, hoyok-ziy namna ma ŋulona lakŋi hiɗi hoyok-ziy guray ma kuɗumna.
Bulu: Ngabe bone bʼIsakar be nga nyoñ nje le, avalʼane mebume map me né, bitison bite a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Hana i hirwuy muvulaka da sukwi ngi Isakar, vur muyo vur muyo, walahay madiɗa tayna jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀwãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Issakar bee geɓe maagol, berniiji ɗi'i bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Issakar bee geɓe maagol, berniiji ɗi'i bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse ŋa hwelefe ta Isakar hɛɗi kezeme ghɛ kala nza ta peləa nci, meleme nyi jama jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege sen wo de sir ma ti äaaran wo mo äuy na diñ tway mani jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Isakarn wo, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: La cinquième part échut par le sort à la tribu des fils d'Aser, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta ta sem vaslta vul nagata mi jafna vi gurona vi Aser kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya.
Bulu: Ngabe tane é nga kôlô é mbe nyô bone bʼAzér, avalʼane mebume map me né.
Guiziga: Ceregezleŋ muzlum naŋ a diɗ ar sukwi ngi Aser. A vulaka taŋ hirwuyo vur muyo vur muyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u njowaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Aser bee geɓe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u njowaɓu waŋgini geɗal lenyol Aser bee geɓe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War mɔɔrɔ-a, tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko o bezaŋ Asɛr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War mɔɔrɔ-a, tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko o bezaŋ Asɛr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa mcɛfe ta bela nya kentave nda geva laka kwasheghediɗi ne, ŋa hwelefe ta ŋwalea Asɛr, kala nza ta peləa nci.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ma de dween se le' ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Aser no, go de ngaäge ti moobe ta' ta'a.

Francais: Leur frontière était Halcath, Chali,
Anglais: And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jar nagata visi kayni ti Helkat, Hali, Beten, Aksaf;
Bulu: Nné wop a mbe Elkat, Ali, Bétén, Aksaf;
Guiziga: Maakway taŋ a bi ti hirwuy Helkat, Hali, Beteŋ, Akesaf,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Keerol maɓɓe hawti Helkat e Hali e Beten e Akisaf
Fulfulde_DC: Keerol maɓɓe hawti Helkat e Hali e Beten e Akisaf
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye nɔ'ɔ duka tɛ nù kɔ-wa: Hɛlkat, Hali, Betɛn, Aksaf,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye nɔ'ɔ duka tɛ nù kɔ-wa: Hɛlkat, Hali, Betɛn, Aksaf,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ghala ta nci ne, Hɛlkat, Hali, Bɛtɛn, Akeshaf,
Tupurri: Hagu äaaran mañ le de Helkad, de Hali, de Beten wo de Aksaf,

Francais: Béten, Axaph, Elmélech, Amaad et Messal; elle touchait, vers l'occident, au Carmel et à Sihor-Labanath; puis elle tournait vers Beth-Dagon,
Anglais: And Alammelech, and Amad, and Mishal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihor–libnath;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Alamalek, Amiyad hiɗi Mikeyal, nam co kat gal ma vulatina, kat Karmel hiɗi Sihor-Libnat;
Bulu: Alamélék, Amead a Mikal, akekui mfaʼa jôp da dim, nkôle Karmél a Sior-Libnat;
Guiziga: Alamelek, Amat waɗ Mikal. Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, maakway aru ngbasl avu muwã Karmel waɗ sipeˀe Sihor-Lipnat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Allammelek e Am'ada e Miseyal. Haa hiirnaaŋge ngol yotti hooseere Karmel e Sihor-Libnat.
Fulfulde_DC: e Allammelek e Am'ada e Miseyal. Haa hiirnaaŋge ngol yotti hooseere Karmel e Sihor-Libnat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Alamɛk, Amead in Miseal.  Gbìsì  nɛɛ fo kaya Karmɛl nɛ war yee-wese in Sihɔr-Libnat.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Alamɛk, Amead in Miseal.  Gbìsì  nɛɛ fo kaya Karmɛl nɛ war yee-wese in Sihɔr-Libnat.
Kapsiki_DC: Alamɛlɛk, Amad ba'a Mishal. Kakwaɗe Karmɛl nde laka ŋkwa kapəkwə ta veci ba'a Shihor-Libnat.
Tupurri: de Alameleg, de Amead wo de Miseyal. Se le' go ti huuli Karmel nen wur bo law, le' go jag pyew Sihor-Libnad.

Francais: touchait Zabulon et la vallée de Jephtahel, au nord de Beth-Emec et de Néhiel, et aboutissait à Caboul,
Anglais: And turneth toward the sunrising to Beth–dagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Iphtah–el toward the north side of Beth–emek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugolda, nam jik hay gal ma fatta dayna, hay Bet-Dagon, jik kat Zabulon hiɗi lokŋa vi Yifta-El hay gal gaa'a vi Bet-Emek hiɗi Neyel, co ta-ta kat Kabul hay gal gulu,
Bulu: A kôñelan mfaʼa jôp da tôô e Bét-Dagon; a nnambe Zabuloñ, a mbiʼili Yifta-El e Bét-Emék a Négél akôé, a ke vame Kabul e mbo ngal.
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi miprike, maakway a gun kini ngir ti Bet-Dagoŋ, meh meh avu hirwuy Zabuloŋ waɗ avu hurjijiŋ ngi Ifta-El. Akẽh na, a bi kini tir vay muŋ ngi Bet-Emek ati Neˀiyel, a muruɗ kini tir vay ngi Kabul,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa wakeere feere ngol yehi fuunaaŋge haa Bayti-Daagon, ngol yotti Zabulon e waadiwol Yiftah-El haa woyla Bayti-Emek e Ne'iyel. Ngol dilli gal woyla Kabul
Fulfulde_DC: Haa wakeere feere ngol yehi fuunaaŋge haa Bayti-Daagon, ngol yotti Zabulon e waadiwol Yiftah-El haa woyla Bayti-Emek e Ne'iyel. Ngol dilli gal woyla Kabul
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zika si daŋa-wese si Bɛt-Dagɔŋ tan nɛ Zabulɔŋ in ɗɔŋgɔ Yifta-Ɛl nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ Bɛt-Emɛk in Nɛiɛl, nɛ́ɛ̀ haɗi sɛn Kabul nɛ war gale.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zika si daŋa-wese si Bɛt-Dagɔŋ tan nɛ Zabulɔŋ in ɗɔŋgɔ Yifta-Ɛl nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ Bɛt-Emɛk in Nɛiɛl, nɛ́ɛ̀ haɗi sɛn Kabul nɛ war gale.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛne ne, kazhɛre geva nde laka bela ta ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea Bɛt-Dagon, kazhigə nde vare Zabəlon ba'a zlərəa Ifta-Ɛl, laka bela kwa gwela ta Bɛt-Ɛmɛk ba'a Nɛyɛl, kajive nde laka kwa gwela ta Kabəwl,
Tupurri: Se kii go Bet-Dagon nen wur bo toñ no kay, hee go ti jag sir ma Sabuloñ wo de log ma Yifta-El go äañ gloñhwede Bet-Emeg wo de Neyele no kay no. Se le' go Kabul go nen äañ gur no kay no.

Francais: à gauche, et à Abran, Rohob, Hamon, et Cana, jusqu'à Sidon la Grande;
Anglais: And Hebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah, even unto great Zidon;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: lo, kat Ebron, Rehob, Hamon hiɗi Kana ta-ta kat Sidon ta ŋolda.
Bulu: A mfaʼa ya Ebroñ, Reôd, Amon a Kana, akekui e beta Sidoñ.
Guiziga: ngir ti Abdoŋ, Rehop, Hamoŋ ati Kana, waɗ ara kiɗ mi a Sidoŋ, walahay madiɗaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Abdon e Rehob e Hammon e Kana, haa yotti Sidon berniwol maŋngol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Abdon e Rehob e Hammon e Kana, haa yotti Sidon berniwol maŋngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  yaka woyo si Hebrɔŋ, Rehob, Hamɔŋ in Kana hɔ nɛnɛ Gasa-Sidɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  yaka woyo si Hebrɔŋ, Rehob, Hamɔŋ in Kana hɔ nɛnɛ Gasa-Sidɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: laka Abdon, Rehob, Hamon ba'a Kana, kantsehe nde hwa'a mbe Sidon, meleme nya wəba.
Tupurri: Se le' go nen Ebron, le' go Rehob, go Hamon, go Kana, haçaç le' wo go Sidoñ äi leege ma kluu no.

Francais: la frontière tournait ensuite vers Ramath jusqu'à la ville forte de Tyr et la frontière tournait vers Hosa, pour aboutir à la mer, près du district d'Achziba;
Anglais: And then the coast turneth to Ramah, and to the strong city Tyre; and the coast turneth to Hosah; and the outgoings thereof are at the sea from the coast to Achzib:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda jaara jik gal Rama ta-ta hay hoyok-ziy ma donona vi Tirus, hay gal Hosa, kay co goy kat niy-lum ma ŋolla, hay galla vi Akzib.
Bulu: A kôñelan mfaʼa ya Rama, a kui tison ôlem ba loone Tir, a mfaʼa ya Osa, a suʼulane vam e mañ, éyoñe te a lôteya ngoto Akzib.
Guiziga: A mbiɗi gunno ngir ti Rama waɗ ng'ar matura ngi Tir muguno ti mohol. Akẽh na, a jik jik ngir ti Hosa, ng'ar mubuliy Mediterane, ara kiɗ mi a Mahalep, Aksip,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden keerol wayliti, yehi Rama e berniwol Tirus. Ton ngol wayliti fahin, ngol yehi Hosa, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela. Woodi boo berniiji ɗi'i nder keerol man: Mahaleeba e Akizib
Fulfulde_DC: Nden keerol wayliti, yehi Rama e berniwol Tirus. Ton ngol wayliti fahin, ngol yehi Hosa, ngol haaɗi haa Mbeela. Woodi boo berniiji ɗi'i nder keerol man: Mahaleeba e Akizib
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zika woyo si war Rama hɔ tɛ ŋgárá Tir, ɓɛɛ zik si Hosa, haɗi nɛnɛ nú gba Tɔp, tɛ nù ko Akzib.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbìsì  zika woyo si war Rama hɔ tɛ ŋgárá Tir, ɓɛɛ zik si Hosa, haɗi nɛnɛ nú gba Tɔp, tɛ nù ko Akzib.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, kazhɛre geva ŋkɛ laka Rama ba'a ŋkwa nya berete nya te hɛɗia Tir, kajive nde laka Hosa kezha miɗi kwa ndərəa Mɛditɛranɛ dzawa laka Mahalɛb, Akzib,
Tupurri: Hagun kii go nen Rama haçaç le' wo go Tir äi leege ma de eegre no, kii go Hosa, hee wo äil ngeel ma Aksib no, day le' wo go jag maarog ma kluu no.

Francais: de plus: Amma, Aphec et Rohob: vingt-deux villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hegena lo, Umma, Afek, Rehob, hoyok-ziy ŋulon dok-ma' yam ma' hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayna.
Bulu: Uma, Afék a Rehôb be too fe été; bitisone mewôm mebaé a bibaé a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Um, Afek waɗ Rehop. Jom gar na, walahay madiɗahay kukur cuw nga cuw, jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Umma e Afek e Rehob, ɗum fuu ɗum berniiji noogas e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: e Umma e Afek e Rehob, ɗum fuu ɗum berniiji noogas e ɗiɗi bee gure maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye Uma, Afɛk in Rehob a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i mbɛt. O gasa ye lɛŋ dee ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye Uma, Afɛk in Rehob a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i mbɛt. O gasa ye lɛŋ dee ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Əwm, Afɛk le Rehob, bakemsə bakeghəmbe meleme nyi jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ te hɛɗia shɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege ma tigriñ hay wo ni pa mono, diñ Uma, Afeg wo de Rehob. Äi leege äaaran wo do äog ti äog de sir ma ti äaaran wo.

Francais: -- Tel fut l'héritage de la tribu des fils d'Aser. Selon leurs familles: ces villes et leurs villages.
Anglais: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families, these cities with their villages.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti vocota vi jafna vi gurona vi Aser, kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya, hoyok-ziy ŋulo namna lakŋi hiɗi naga guray ma kuɗumna.
Bulu: Ngabe si bone bʼAzér nje le, avalʼane mebume map me né: bitisone bite a minlame miap.
Guiziga: Hana i hirwuy muvulaka da sukwi ngi Aser, vur muyo vur muyo, i walahay tayna jom ti prok taŋhaya wãˀ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum woni geɗal lenyol Aser bee geɓe maagol, berniiji ɗi'i bee gure maaji.
